name: The Omins
description: Lead your faction of omins in fantastic worlds, build their villages, train their skills, satisfy their needs, and send them to war! Will you save them from the destruction deity Nefasto and his hordes of Gormuns? Play the role of a deity in this real-time strategy inspired by the classic god games.

name: My Life of Repayment
description: If you don't work, you will eat dirt! To pay off your loans, you will take on various jobs. Make pancakes, perform archery, and operate a space drone! Enjoy a changeable work experience in your busy life!

name: GetsuFumaDen: Undying Moon - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: R-Type Tactics I & II Cosmos: Deluxe Edition
description: Includes R-Type Tactics I・II Cosmos: Standard Edition, Digital Soundtrack and a Poster

name: Cuphead: Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge - Special Edition
description:
This version includes:

- A standard edition copy of the game.
- One randomly selected Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles eye mask
- CD Soundtrack featuring 28 tracks presented in a pizza box styled case
- 4x 30mm Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles metal pins
- Metal Shredder keyring
- Numbered autograph art card
- 80mm sewer manhole cover metal coaster

name: Bay Lynx
description: Clever, fast, and fun. Bay Lynx honors the mascot platformer formula with classic gameplay mechanics and smartly designed levels.

name: Knightmares
description: Face yourself in an epic tale of honor, courage and fusions. Knightmares will make you see fantasy from... A different point of view.

name: Western Rye
description: Welcome to the harsh and lawless world of the Wild West, where a mysterious fever called the 'Rye Fever' has turned the once-proud frontier into a lawless wasteland. In this world, survival is the only law, and you'll need to be tough, quick-witted, and deadly if you hope to make it out alive.

name: Alex Kidd in Miracle World DX: Signature Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Flying Carpets Over Shark Infested Waters
description: Combat and survival. Escape from the Death Maze and from Rat Island. Defeat the pirates in aerial combat, while sharks swim below. Board the pirate ship and steal their gold. Everyone and everything is out to get you. Get them first. In the final scene find and terminate your nemesis. The parrots.

name: The Last Seal
description: When a presumed to be extinct race starts wreaking havoc, Joan and Cadel begin what will be the journey of their lives.

name: Timeshift
description: Timeshift is a unique take on 2D platformers. Use a saved position and your momentum to escape the Rift!

name: The Sisters 2: Road to Fame
description:
Get on trend and take the road to fame!
Double the trouble, double the fun, our Sisters are back to cause twice the chaos!

name: New Day
description: New Day is an upcoming life simulation game where almost anything can happen! Create your own islanders, design their apartments, and get involved with their day-to-day life as they divulge into unexpected friendships, problems, and more!

name: Konike
description: Konike is a turn-based strategy RPG about hunting ghosts for money. Play as a man down on his luck as he uses probability-powered Finder devices to locate invisible spirits in rural America. Use both your skill and intuition to survive, all while uncovering the mystery of your own past and future.

name: Charge!
description: Charge! Lead your elite squad to advance! Use dozens of weapons, armor sets, and relics to create a variety of gameplay styles and eliminate endless enemies!

name: Viking Invaders
description: A turn-based strategy game! Enjoy a fun local PvP tactical battles with up to 4 friends and family!Invade and capture enemy defenses.Beware! This game may cause you to loose friends!

name: August Walk
description: The game has three story branches: normal, realistic, and mystical walk. In the normal branch you can just walk around the summer city, the forest and the spring.

name: Emiline: The Ghost of White Willow
description: A psychological horror VR game. Taking place during the events of D-day, find yourself trapped in the gothic horrors of White Willow Manor Hall. Follow your sections lieutenant into combat before fighting a new battle of survival in the dark haunted past of the house.

name: Labrys
description: Labrys is a multiplayer (up to 1v5) horror game where players are thrown into a randomly generated labyrinth against a minotaur. Play as the minotaur or one of up to five human players trying to escape the labyrinth while avoiding the minotaur.

name: MoonWool
description: MoonWool is a sheep herding game in a space cartoon universe. You must save your sheep stranded in the cosmos ! On tiny planet, you will have to guide them into safety, against dangerous hazard and monsters !

name: Through the Mist
description: A terrible disease known as the Blight is spreading across all four corners of the world. Without a cure, he who is afflicted by it, is doomed. As the Lighwielder, Edan must now find it's origin and cause and put it to an end. He is people's last hope.

name: Wildstrive
description: Wildstrive - is an open-world first-person survival game. Craft tools, build a camp, harvest crops, explore the land, tame and fight wild animals. Challenge nature and solve the mystery of the lost island!

name: Mother Ghoul: The Curse of Unborns
description: The next victim is you. Mother Ghoul is a horror and thriller game where you try to survive against a cursed ghost that you have been offered as a sacrifice. To break free from the curse, you must find and destroy her stillborn children through a ritual. This is the only way...

name: It Is Ticking
description: The world is being attacked by terrorists, they use highly dangerous explosive devices to cause massive destruction in urban zones. You, A bomb-defusing expert, must take action to protect our nation's lives.

name: A Priest Walks Into a Graveyard
description: A Priest Walks Into a Graveyard is a retro-style action roguelite game with elements of horror. Boost your priest abilities and survive as long as you can in a graveyard full of hostile and never-ending creatures.

name: Tsukichi Chronicles
description: Tsukichi is a captivating game that'll keep you entertained for hours. With its blend of story, combat, and exploration, you are sure to have an incredible experience. So, if you're looking for an action RPG with an engaging story, intense combat, and beautiful scapes, Tsukichi is perfect for you!

name: Real Web Legends: Carter's Quest
description: Fight, solve puzzles, and learn the secrets of Homunculi in this character-action RPG experience. Create and customize your own Homunculus, develop new techniques and combos with an array of weapons, and fight to end a centuries-long conflict.

name: Solar Showdown
description: Welcome to Solar Showdown - the ultimate 2-player couch competitive game where you harvest solar power, build defenses, and produce minions to attack your opponent's towers. Generate enough power to activate your base's ultimate weapon and blow up your rival! Grow, build, defend, and dominate!

name: Anime Champ
description: Anime Champ is an arcade Bishi Bashi game released on 2000 exclusively in Japan. It was developed and published by Konami. Players play a variety of mini games from five anime from the 60s and 70s.

name: Neko Shooters
description: Sin descripción

name: Cold and Afraid
description:
In the tranquil confines of a college town, an idyllic peace is shattered by the brutal murder of a student. Shocked and alarmed, the local authorities soon uncover a chilling truth:

​this ghastly act is merely the tip of the iceberg.

As a grim pattern emerges with each successive discovery of mutilated bodies, it becomes evident that a cunning serial killer is haunting the town, leaving a trail of terror in their wake.

name: Monster&Strategy
description: A dungeon adventure card game, a maze generated by the program, unpredictable monster combinations, and a large number of cards, treasures, to measure the trade-offs and build your unique card set!

name: The Dead Await
description: Build your deck and try to survive in The Dead Await, a deck-building RPG set during a zombie apocalypse. As one of many survivors, set out across the desolate world, discover the truth about the outbreak, and rebuild human civilization - or die trying.

name: Barold: Inferno
description: "Barold: Inferno" is an action-packed dungeon crawler game where you play as the knight Barold, fighting demons and gods in the depths of hell using different weapons and abilities.

name: Tiny Dungeons
description: Your party left you for dead, but a mysterious figure called 'The fortune teller' reanimated you... A sprawling labyrinth, hoards of enemies, and elite bosses stand between you and freedom. Alone, you don't stand a chance, but with the help of The Fortune Teller, you might just make it...

name: Backrooms: Wit's End
description: Backrooms: Wit's End is an immersive coop survival horror game, featuring dreadful spaces and dynamic gameplay mechanics. Explore the different levels with your friends, while trying to escape from many puzzling entities.

name: Kiborg
description: Kiborg is a fast-paced, story-driven action game with rogue-lite encounters. Each challenge is unique and the narrative always moves forward, win or lose. Become an unstoppable war machine and face the consequences of your actions as you lead a resistance group on a faraway prison planet.

name: Eternals' Path
description: Eternals’ Path is a roguelike, tactical turn-based RPG about struggles and poor choices you made and had during your life that will haunt you in death. Incarnate anti-heroes through different places. Fight those who wander there, but also people you knew in your life with lots of grievances to share

name: Loot and Shoot
description: Loot and Shoot is a dungeon crawler 2D platformer action roguelite. Travel through various procedurally generated lands, battle challenging enemies, and collect diverse resources to expand your city and unlock new weapons. Avoid lava and carve your own path to the top as everything is destructible.

name: One-Thousand Cuts
description: One-Thousand Cuts is a samurai action side-scroller with cinematic action and instant-death combat. Hack and slash your way through the infamous Army of One-Thousand and reclaim your rightful place as daimyo.

name: Zombie Ants VR
description: Zombie Ants VR is a short (5-10 minute) experience that takes the player through the life cycle of Ophiocordyceps, a fungus that drives creatures (in this case ants) to change their behavior in order to propagate the fungus and ultimately kills them.

name: D or D
description: D or D is a psychological horror game that immerses you in daily experiences.One page in high school student Xiaoshan's notebook is written with some words starting with the letter "d"

name: Corporate Lockdown
description: Trapped alone in the underground mining facility, the out-of-control security robots are frantically knocking on the iron door behind you. You have no choice but to continue to go deeper, even if the source of all the chaos comes from deeper...

name: Lonely Path
description: Lonely Path is a relaxing puzzle game where you move and stacks tiles to create paths through 5 nature themed, hand-drawn regions! Try your hand at 100 different levels or make your own and share them with the community!

name: Date with Foxgirl
description: Have you ever wondered why you don't have a girlfriend? Or have you ever wondered if you will ever find a girlfriend? Sometimes it doesn't take much to meet a beautiful foxy girl... Just go to a cafe for coffee in time, and have a little perseverance and desire...

name: IAlly
description: iAlly is a mystery-action game that you can play alone or with 3 friends. Are you ready to feel like a time traveler by solving unique puzzles in a museum full of artifacts from the real world?

name: Yugowave
description: Dystopian, abandoned, industrial space. What you hear: war speeches from Yugoslavia. What you see: TV screens with retro Yugoslavian music videos.

name: Bunny Prison Break
description: Break out of prison in this fast-paced and brutal retro-styled roguelite. Incarcerated in a concentration camp by odious Swine invaders, you have to shoot your way out to freedom. Blast through hordes of enemies and fullfill your quest for revenge.

name: Kamikaze Lassplanes
description: Fly and fall for powerful Lassplanes! Discover a hand-crafted anime VN with story-driven arcade shoot-'em-up gameplay. Take part in a romantic story with drama and comedic elements set in a steampunk Kingdom filled with magic and torn by a brutal war. Decide the fate of your country and heart.

name: Vengeance of Mr. Peppermint
description: Embody a hard-boiled detective seeking bloody justice. in an old-school, Korean-style beat-’em-up. Plow through the criminal underworld to find and punish those responsible for his sister's death...before his mind unravels and his vengeance completely destroys him.

name: Troubles in Silesia Country
description:
Troubles in Silesia Country is a mod for Half-Life 2: Episode Two which plays in the Silesia region of Poland or the Czech Republic.

The mod's environment is heavily inspired by towns and villages at the Polish-Czech border region, like Úvalno, Krnov and Ostrava.

One day you wake up in your home village and go for a ride just when Combine attack begins...

name: Galactic Commandos
description: Take control of three Galactic Commandos to infiltrate an alien spacecraft in this stealth-action game!

name: Progressbar Popup Fighter
description:
Progressbar Popup Fighter is a spin-off game of Progressbar95, initially released on 22 December 2020, developed and published by Spooky House Studios.

It is about not overwhelming the CPU with a lot of pop-ups; if it gets overwhelmed, a BSOD will appear.

Even though the game received some updates that added new content and features, it is safe to assume it has been abandoned due to the lack of updates and discussion about it.

name: Underquest
description: Cute fantasy roguelite with backpack mechanics. Combine items to create powerful skills and use them in fast-paced combat. Explore randomly generated dungeons in the Underkingdom and discover the secrets of its inhabitants!

name: Glassfall
description:
'Glassfall' is a funny arcade, an 'acrobatic adventure'. Its main protagonist is a small robot named Adapter (aka Dongle). The game takes place in a surreal place of 'deleted memories', where all objects: houses, cars, buses, planes etc. are mixed together creating a vertical maze.

Gravity is your enemy! You need to carefully jump down from one platform to another, without crashing. Once the protagonist reaches the very floor, you can travel to the next level.

name: Pregnant Talking Cat Emma
description:
Emma the Cat and Oscar are expecting little kittens! Wonderful, right? Too bad Oscar had to go so far away to hunt, so pregnant talking cat Emma is all alone now. Thankfully, she has you! You’ll help your virtual kitty cat Emma go through her pregnancy, right? We all know that’s not easy and Pregnant Talking Cat Emma misses Oscar so much! She is so lonely without him, and she can really use some company and support. Be there for your pregnant virtual cat Emma, and help her prepare to be a mom! Play this virtual pet pregnant game and be the biggest support for your pregnant Emma!

As talking cat Emma is about to have three little talking kitties, she's going to need all the care a pregnant cat can get. Play talking cat pregnant games in order to take this pregnant mommy cat to her doctor so that the kitty cat virtual pet can do an ultrasound and other check-ups. Make sure her talking kitties are safe and sound.

name: My Virtual Pet Louie the Pug
description:
Welcome to virtual pet games pug life, y'all! My Virtual Pet Dog Louie the Pug is the most charming virtual dog out there, the new virtual pet royalty. Adopt this virtual puppy dog now and let him make your day every time you meet with him. Louie the Pug is not a talking dog. He's a virtual puppy dog that will stick his tongue out and be cool.

Your virtual dog needs to be taken care of – feed him, take him out to pee, bathe him, and play with him. Dog dress-up games are what Louie the Pug really enjoys, so play pet dog games with him and make him the most swag virtual dog out there!

name: Cubzh
description: Play an infinite number of games, create your own items and worlds, and share them with friends. Hang out, compete, and chat in a virtual space where creativity knows no limits.

name: Destiny 2: Lightfall - Season of the Deep
description: In Season of the Deep, Guardians must travel to Saturn's moon of Titan and investigate an unexpected distress call. Guardians are tasked with diving into the depths of it's methane ocean to uncover ancient secrets and disrupt the Taken and Hive rituals beneath the waves.

name: WheelTris
description:
Wheeltris defines a new genre of casual games. Its is inspired by charming clockwork apparatuses such as clocks, automatons and other steam-punk masterpieces. The game provides unique experience you have never seen before. It combines vivid and mesmerizing visuals, addictive gameplay and easy controls.

Draw lines of wheels. Collect bonuses. Deal with obstacles and dangers. Meet puzzles. And much more.

name: Satanislas
description: Gamble your lives in this fast-paced, hard-as-hell precision platformer, and overcome countless devilish traps across five realms of carefully handcrafted levels. Having trouble? Spend a few souls to gain formidable powers... Or handicap yourself with some curses.

name: Space Drilling Station
description: In Space Drilling Station, manage and automate a drilling station on a distant planet. Build a multi-level vertical structure to produce and manage your resources and staff, in order to solve the energy crisis and destroy the competition.

name: Dark Desire Mute 5
description: This visual novel continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. This complex story includes also the life of Stephanie, Michelle, Monica, etc.

name: Tako no Himitsu: Ocean of Secrets
description: Tako no Himitsu: Ocean of Secrets is an indie Action RPG made as a tribute to the Game Boy Advance era of gaming. A spiritual successor to Save me Mr Tako, play in a world where Octopuses were erased from history.

name: PC Building Simulator: IT Expansion
description:
The PC Building Simulator - IT Expansion is the second DLC of PC Building Simulator published by The Irregular Corporation in collaboration with FuturLab. Unlike Esports Expansion, this expansion is free and included when player updated to newer version.

Build and grow your very own computer repair enterprise as you learn to diagnose, fix and build PCs. With real-world licensed components and comprehensive hardware and software simulation, you can plan and bring your ultimate PC to life.

name: Kamek's Midnight Flight
description: Nabbit has stolen the legendary "Miyamoto" book from Kamek's Library. In the wrong hands, this book could cause great danger. Kamek must get it back before the book causes even more chaos!

name: Landborne
description: Someone's stolen the Mushroom Kingdom's entire ocean, and this Cheep-Cheep's not gonna stop dive-bombing his way across the landscape until they find out who!

name: Eddie's World
description:
Venture through Tockin island as Eddie to recover stolen E-Tanks!

This game features Mega man styled gameplay mixed with puzzles and unusual boss fights.
8 standard and 1 special levels to complete and a big hub full of puzzles to explore.

Made with Megamix Engine.

name: Super Mario Kart NES
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Construct
description: Super Mario Construct is a browser-based Mario level editor focusing on ease of use and advanced editing tools at the same time.

name: Super Mario Construct 2: Yoshi's Fabrication Station
description: Yoshi’s Fabrication Station is a Yoshi’s Island level editor. It’s easy to use and has a faithful recreation of the original YI mechanics and physics!

name: Super Mario: Magnum Opus
description:
Mario ain't screwing around. He's got a gun this time. Each bullet is gonna send him flying sky high.

Introducing an all new Mario adventure, combining elements of classic Mario platforming, action-packed Run N' Gun gameplay, and a gripping cinematic storyline about family and betrayal.

Journey through flowering fields, ancient desert ruins, nuclear wastelands, and much more. Join the Mario Bros. on their mysterious search to find their third brother, all while fighting against the mischevious business man known as JB.

name: Super Mario Odyssey Safari
description:
Mario's off on a globe-trotting adventure!
Or, he would be if not for some faulty wiring. Explore the mysterious Bonefall Island to find a way to Fossil Falls. From the flowery peaks of Sakura Armory to the forgotten depths of Legend Forest, forge your path through this action packed open-world platformer with familiar gameplay from the hit Super Mario Odyssey.

name: Heritage: A Dragon's Tale
description:
It was a day like any other in the Skybound Isles when a dark mass arose from the clouds that separated the forgotten and dangerous world below from the home of the dragons above. General Mechos, a powerful military leader of the humans launched an attack on the floating islands and abducted the dragoness Crystal for reasons unknown.

Flame, a trainee knight and Crystal's best friend, travels to the forgotten kingdom of Mineria having sworn to find her and put an end to whatever plot General Mechos has planned. On his journey, Flame will face incredible dangers, discover more about the kingdom of Mineria, why the dragons were separated from the earth to live in the sky, and discover his own destiny.

name: Essence of Waluigi
description:
Ralorche is back with his first attempt at a serious fan game!

5 years ago, Luigi was killed by "the essence". As a result of this, Mario has left the Mushroom Kingdom. Now, thanks to a reoccuring nightmare, Mario has decided to go back and destroy Waluigi's essence once and for all. However, "the essence" plans to destroy the world and build it's own horrifying utopia on it's ruins. Mario will have to travel across locations rarely seen in normal Mario games and battle against new enemies. Will Mario avenge his brother, or will he suffer the same fate?

Or, will he become corrupted by the Essence Of Waluigi?

name: Cook Out!
description: Cook Out! is a fan game made by Cruise Elroy to look like an arcade game Nintendo could have produced circa 1984. The objective of the game is to throw veggies into a cooking pot while avoiding getting caught by beings of fire. The game features 4 unique boards and up to 99 levels of play. How high of a score can YOU get?

name: WarioWare Mouse Workz!
description: WarioWare Mou$e Workz! is a custom made minigame that features eleven microgames and a boss game.

name: Maridows 64
description: Maridows 64 is a mock operating system based off of the Super Mario video game character.

name: Mario Kart: Speed Strife
description: The game features 12 characters, 8 of which are playable from the start. There are 16 tracks split up into four cups. If you get a trophy in one of the cups while playing in Grand Prix mode, you will unlock its respective characters. Additional to the Grand Prix mode there is also Time Trial mode where you can try to set up record times on your favorite tracks, as well as Vs Race where you can play with your own rules. You can customize speed class, CPU difficulty, which items appear, and more.

name: New Super Mario Kart
description: Sin descripción

name: Luigi Doesn't Drink A Glass of Milk
description: Mario is missing. At the same time, the milk factory has seen a massive sudden boost in productivity. His brother, left in the dark, knows that there is some kind of connection... and so, one fateful night, Luigi heads off to discover the truth.

name: Mario Drinks A Glass of Milk
description: In this game, Mario drinks a glass of milk.

name: V-Ware
description:
V-Ware is a WarioWare-themed minigame with 21 microgames, unlockable achievements and online statistics!

Try to get as far as you can to make it to the highscore list, or practice individual microgames while trying to unlock something new!

name: Princess Quest Part 1
description:
A Retro-style Action RPG starring the Mario Bros and Princess Peach!

Every 25 years, the Mushroom Kingdom throws a quarter-century celebration, called the Jubilee. The last Jubilee was held when the Princess was a child, by her father, the late King Toadstool.

It is during the Jubilee that a shocking revelation about the history of the Toadstool Family comes about...

name: Super Mario Bros: Revenge of Bowser
description: Oh no! Princess Peach has been trapped by Bowser! Go through pipes in Peach's castle which take you all around the Mushroom Kingdom in this classic platformer, and collect the stars by finishing a level, finding 5 Ace coins, and finding the hidden shine. Can you collect all 120 stars in 40 levels, and defeat Bowser?

name: Super Mario Bros 3000
description: Sin descripción

name: New Super Mario Kart 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Pyoro +
description: An arcade-style fangame featuring the character Pyoro from the WarioWare series.

name: New and Tasty
description: A collection of 12 minigames complete with achievements and online high scores.

name: Crazy Lakitu DX
description: Sin descripción

name: Koopa: A Winter's Tale
description: Koopa: A Winter's Tale is an atmospheric exploration minigame featuring nearly 100% original graphics and backgrounds. Journey through three wintery levels as a Koopa Troopa, just trying to find the stuff needed for a warm winter night.

name: Mario Learns About Colors: Recolored
description: Guide Mario to the silver pipe through worlds of puzzles by painting him different colors. The game's special rule is that you pass through any obstacle that matches your color. Be careful, this applies to enemies as well!

name: Beat: The Game
description: Beat: The Game is a Mega Man fangame that puts Beat into the spotlight for once! As the robotic bird, you must peck any rogue robot that threatens to hurt Eddie! The trip is only one level long, but you can always try to beat your own high-score! There's also an original, chiptune soundtrack courtesy of Cadet!

name: The Legend of the Radient Mask 2
description: Fight bosses, discover areas, find treasure and challenge your friends in 2-player mode!

name: Super Mario Fangame
description: Sin descripción

name: Wario and the Magic Map
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Epic 2: Dream Machine
description: The sequel to Super Mario Epic, Super Mario Epic 2 has over 15 levels and features like Flippers, Hammer Brothers suit, and more!

name: Luigi Land: The Bootleg Invasion
description: Trouble's brewing in Sarasaland again! Mario travels there to put a stop to the chaos but gets captured for his troubles. Luigi, not taking any chances, has E. Gadd upgrade the Sky Pop and flies it into Sarasaland, embarking on a challenging journey (depending on your difficulty setting) to save both Princess Daisy and his brother.

name: Ghost House Pong
description:
It's Boo-against-Boo in this arcade-style minigame!

- Play Singles or Doubles matches with up to four players.

- Compete across five different courts, each with its own hazards that can be turned on or off.

- Listen to a playlist of classic tracks from the Mario series, as well as other spooky video game tracks.

- USB Controllers are required for doubles matches with 3-4 players.

name: Ultimate Mario Bros.
description: Classic Mario Bros. action in a single player adventure mode and online multiplayer modes. With the help of Toad, Mario must discover the source of the sewer monsters, and defeat the man responsible!

name: Super Mario Fan Galaxy
description: A sequel to Super Mario Fangame, with Mario Galaxy theme.

name: MFGG 10th Anniversary Time Capsule
description:
July 9th, 2011, ten years after MFGG was founded in 2001, we take a look back on what fangames were like back then.

This compilation contains 11 games from the early days of MFGG, made by MFGG veterans, but ultimately never completed.

Included in the compilation:
1998 - Super Mario X
2001 - Luigi Quest
2001 - Super Sonic Bros.
2001 - Super Mario: The Project
2002 - Wario Eats Everything
2002 - Luigi's Game
2002 - Toad Strikes Back (Prototype Version)
2003 - Mario Spy
2003 - Pocket Mario
2005 - Waligie 3: On Mars
2006 - MarioQuest 3: The Ghost of SEGA

name: A Rare Encounter
description: A Rare Encounter is a short visual-novel written by Raina Lilith Henlan, with programming and art by Sophie Le Blanc. This project was made to get something out there, while testing the waters for bigger projects down the line.

name: XraYe
description: Guide Raye through all 14 levels turning as many pegs as you can.

name: SM64 Remastered Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: The Quest For Milk 64
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario Aimlessly Drives a Car Around the City 64
description: Sin descripción

name: Victory Unity
description:
A hack designed with the intent of capturing the experience of Zelda Ocarina of Time entrance randomizer in an SM64 romhack.
All levels in this hack are overworlds taken from other hacks.

name: P Rank 64
description: Play through sm64 with the P ranks from Pizza Tower! Defeat enemies and collect coins to keep your combo timer up while you collect all 6 stars in each level. If you want to shoot higher than P rank, collect the 100 coin star as well for the brand new M rank!
Sin descripción

name: Super Pink Gold Peach 64
description: A short hack where you play as Pink Gold Peach, featuring Mario Kart-style gameplay, as you get to drive around Royal Raceway on a modified shell-kart.

name: Serene Fusion
description: Serene Fusion is a SM64 romhack that was made to remediate Project 74 courses. Not only it features the best courses from the Super Mario 74 remade but also includes a whole lot of side content made by various romhackers!

name: The Magical Lands
description: The Magical Lands is a cross between a reimagining and a sequel to the original Mario 64. Visit new and familiar places, meet new friends, face new foes, and save Peach's castle from Bowser's clutches!

name: The Gate of The Good
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Rainbow Road
description: Sin descripción

name: SM64: The Green Comet
description: A hack that takes the concept of Green Stars from Super Mario Galaxy 2 and applies it to SM64. Each level has Green Stars hidden throughout it, that are tricky to find or get. There is also a brand-new, bonus level unlocked after 120 stars.

name: Super Mario and the Grand Star
description:
'Super Mario and the Grand Star' is a ROM hack of Super Mario 64 with a total of 116 stars to collect.

Bowser and his minions have gone to war with the Mushroom Kingdom, though the tides of the war are constantly shifting.
To help shift the war in his direction, Bowser travels to the Moon in search of a prophesied ancient relic known as the Grand Star.
The situation goes from bad to worse when Bowser awakens Khonsu, one of the last surviving members of an alien civilization.
Khonsu seems to think the people of Earth killed his people many years ago, and vows to destroy the Earth to get revenge.
It's now up to Mario to save the world from Khonsu!

This game is set to take place after the events of Super Mario 64 and shortly before the events of Super Mario Sunshine.

name: Mario Stops Climate Change 64
description: A hack made to help with MrBeast's Team Trees event, where Mario stops climate change in Bob-omb Battlefield.

name: Corroded Charklet City
description: A fast paced kaizo level with 7 extremely precise stars and lots of innovative and unique ideas!

name: Dragon Drive: Tactics Break
description: Sin descripción

name: Zoids Battle Card Game: Seihou Tairiku Senki
description: Sin descripción

name: Basketball Showdown 2
description: Match up against your friends, your enemies, or anyone worldwide in a head-to-head Basketball Showdown!

name: Demoniac Words
description: The evil has taken everything from two sorrowful girls, but the girls will not stop fighting, they will not stop resisting. They are not fighting for themselves.

name: MidEvil
description: MidEvil is a singleplayer, multiplayer or co-op open world survival RPG that takes place in a vast 20km medieval island setting. Players start shipwrecked on the zombie infested island with nothing. The goals are simple, survive, build, defend!

name: Pool Blitz
description:
Challenge your friends, enter pool tournaments, and go head to head against players in real-time. Shoot pool with ultra-realistic physics, breath-taking graphics, and play online with friends.

Pool Blitz, has a variety of games modes, something for every Pool fan. Choose 8-Ball for an authentic pool experience or New Blitz mode for a no-wait multiplayer experience. Pick your mode!

name: Drift Horizon: Car Driving & Tuning
description: Become a legendary drifter! Tune and upgrade your car, install parts and boost performance! With a dozen of cars to choose from, get them on the track and test them out!

name: Dice Legacy: Definitive Edition
description:
Roll and use your dice to gather resources, construct buildings, expand your settlement and face the menacing threats of a mysterious ringworld.

Dice Legacy Definitive Edition includes all the content from the original Dice Legacy release plus the three major updates.

name: Syphon Filter: Logan's Shadow
description: A port of Syphon Filter: Logan’s Shadow, originally released on the PlayStation Portable system, featuring optimised rendering, rewind, quick saving, and custom video filters.

name: Pursuit Force
description:
Experience Pursuit Force originally released on the PlayStation Portable system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Five vicious gangs are fighting for control of Capital City. The terrified public has given up hope – and the Chief of Police wants results, fast!

Jump into action as a member of the elite Pursuit Force and rid the state of corruption. Dive behind the wheel of a truck, a speedboat or even a helicopter as you hunt down criminals and recover stolen goods.

This title has been converted from the PSP version to the PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5 consoles and provides newly added features.

name: Pizza Brave
description:
Pizza Brave is a fast-paced platform-adventure game in a retro pixelart atmosphere.
Deliver delicious Pizzas across dangerous worlds, while keeping your clients happy!
Pizza Brave combines the adrenaline of action-platformers with the engaging fun of multi-option graphic adventure style dialogs.

name: Bio Inc. Nemesis
description: Bio Inc. Nemesis is a free-to-play real-time strategy simulator where you assemble a team of doctors and inflict lethal diseases on hapless patients. Assume control of your very own hospital and recruit doctors from many different medical fields, including modern medicine, alternative treatments, and spiritual healing. Manipulate a patient’s lifestyle and develop risk factors to make them more vulnerable to infection. Terminate the patient before an opposing team of doctors find cures and vaccines to save them!

name: Lost In Space: Dimensions
description:
Explore space and all his dimensions with Lost in Space!
Pilot your spaceship in deep space and avoid planets, asteroids and black holes by collecting power ups and coins. Search the portals, they will take you to another dimension!

name: Nano Golf: Hole In One
description: Get a hole in one. How far can you get without missing a shot?

name: All Star Quarterback 22
description: ﻿Call the shots and make every big choice in the game. Lead your team to glory in the ultimate football simulation!

name: Sequentia
description: The goal is simple : Just find the best path between the start & end points that allows you to collect the required items on your way & avoid hitting the obstacles or collecting non-required items.

name: Where's the Floor?
description: Roll around to uncover the floor and find the finish. Collect gems to style your ball, upgrade to expert controls, unlock camera zoom, and get crazy glow floors!

name: Beyond U
description: Sin descripción

name: Ludo's Quest
description:
Ludo's Quest is a side-scrolling platformer inspired from Super Mario Bros and Ghosts 'n Goblins. Fun for the young and old. Complete all 16 levels.
Want more levels? Become a game designer and craft your own with the built-in level editor. You can even publish your levels on the web to share with friends and family. Play levels others have crafted.

name: Bishook.
description: Bishook is a unique strategy board game that blends Chess and an in-a-row game for twice the fun.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Numberlink
description: Numberlink is a puzzle where you connect the same numbers without crossing lines. Trust your instinct and get connecting! Keep in mind that the longer the distance, the harder it gets.

name: Ritual Bound
description: Deep in the forest, the witches watch over a prison, keeping an Old Horror sealed. Tonight, the seals binding it must be renewed... But there's a problem.

name: SuperStar Stayc
description: SuperStar Stayc is a mobile rhythm game, containing the songs from the Girl group Stayc. Developed by Dalcomsoft, the same creators of titles like SuperStar JYPNATION and SuperStar SMTOWN.

name: The Pizza
description:
You decide to hold a party and order a pizza.
What could possibly go wrong...

name: Five Night At Lego World
description: Sin descripción

name: Five Nights At Your Mom's House
description:
So you need to work at Your Mom's House.
but some people want to come by and Kill You.

name: Pocket Love 2
description: Sequel to Pocket Love for Game Boy.

name: Jumpy
description: A 2D platformer jump-rope simulator. The game comes with accolades that you get when you reach a certain number of jumps that tell you how many times you've reached that milestone.

name: Five Nights at Youtuber's
description: Sin descripción

name: Hello Kitty Kawaii Town
description: A Hello Kitty mobile game.

name: Arcade Classics
description:
This prototype was never released (6 units are known to exist). If this game had been released on schedule it would have commemorated Atari's 20th anniversary. It has 2 games on offer, "Super Centipede" and "Missile Command II". They are both re-makes of the original classics but with enhanced graphics and sound.

After selecting "more new stuff" in the operator's mode; two kinds of spaceships will appear in the "Missile Command II" game. The "Mothership" that appears after a few levels is exactly the same as (except less detailed than) "Birdsnest", which is a spaceship on page 21 of the 1978 book "Spacecraft 2000 to 2100AD".

The spaceships in the "Invasion Wave" are probably ripped from another book in the series.

name: Arcadia
description: An arcade shmup developed by NMK released in 1994.

name: Axel in Harlem: The Game
description: You're the chosen one to help him gather homies for... his "night parties". Guide him to victory before the time runs out!

name: Atlantia
description:
A journalist from the Fame magazine, along with a photographer, is sent on the maiden voyage of the luxury cruise ship Atlantia. The assignment is to get an interview from the sheikh of Harrout -- the owner of the ship.

Aboard, several sudden explosions rock the ship, and a voice from the announcement system tells: We are sinking! Get to the lifeboats immediately

name: Santa's Monster Shootout
description: Monsters and Zombies from all the world are trying to steal the gift packages, they want it all and they want it now. But Santa has guns, big guns!

name: Nerd Quiz
description: Nerd Quiz is a trivia game about video games.

name: Talking Cat Emma Ballerina
description:
My virtual pet Emma the cat has reached a new stage in her life: ballet dance school for talking pets. This talking kitty cat will show off her new ballerina dance skills in Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina virtual pet game. Teach my talking cat Emma virtual pet bring style and grace into the world of talking pets. Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina is a talking cat app that enriches all those dance games and ballerina games out there.

Can you multitask and make your talking cat ballerina glow from head to toe by making sure she is well fed, examined and rested? Emma the Ballerina, my talking cat, needs you every step of the way, so download Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina virtual pet game and help your talking cat pave the way to success! Virtual cat talking games will from now on take your breath away while my talking cat Emma parades her dance steps and ballet moves in her prima ballerina costume.

name: Offshore
description:
This modification offers a multi-level side story of Gordon Freeman while en-route to City 17 via Highway 17 in the infamous buggy.

When Gordon’s buggy was taken by the Combine Dropship, some maps of combine outposts hidden in one of the buggy’s side compartments were lost. Gordon was immediately dispatched by Dr. Kleiner and Dr. Eli Vance to locate the buggy and return the missing maps.

Setting: The entire modification is set at night on a small, rocky island off the coast of City 17. Rugged terrain, abandon structures, and multiple combine outposts will make escaping this island hell more than just a walk in the park.

His plan: Gordon surrenders to the combine so he could be transported to the facility where the buggy was left for scrap. Upon his surrender, he found himself in a small prison facility on the rocky island, waiting for a visit from Dr. Wallace Breen who would read his sentence personally. A familiar face woke him from his deep sedation…

His mission: Locate the buggy and find a way to return to City 17 with the stolen maps.

name: Vigor Chronicles: Salvation
description: Unfold the Chronicles and repent for salvation! What would you do if the apocalypse forced you to leave your precious city? How would you adapt to a different environment? In this update, you can enjoy Myren as an Encounter map and discover the secrets left behind from the society that abandoned it. Gain your vantage point and eliminate your enemies with the new L96 sniper rifle.

name: Sakura Flamingo Archives
description:
Sakura Flamingo Archives is a compilation of Milestone's five arcade shooters:

- Chaos Field
- Radirgy
- Karous
- Illvelo
- Radirgy Noa

It also features a "Mixture" mode, and a "Death" mode, both of which could be played with any ship from the games mentioned above.

name: Dream League Soccer 2023
description: Dream League Soccer 2023 puts you in the heart of the action with a fresh look and brand new features! Build your dream team from over 4,000 FIFPRO licensed players and take to the field against the world’s best soccer clubs! Rise through 8 divisions whilst enjoying full 3D motion-captured player moves, immersive in-game commentary, team customisations and much more. The beautiful game has never been so good!

name: Game & Watch Oil Panic
description: A port of Oil Panic for the Nintendo DSi.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Premium Edition
description:
The Premium Edition includes the Kombat Pack, early access to the game beginning Sept. 14, and 1,250 Dragon Krystals (in-game currency).

The Kombat Pack will feature a Johnny Cage character skin with the likeness of famed actor and martial artist, Jean-Claude Van Damme (available at launch), early access to six new playable characters (available post-launch), and five new Kameo Fighters (available post-launch)

name: Bikmin 269
description: A Rom hack of Pikmin 2, featuring new areas, enemies, treasure and much more

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Kollector's Edition
description:
The Kollector's Edition is a physically only release for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S at select retailers. It includes all Premium Edition content, along with a 16.5-inch Liu Kang sculpture designed by COARSE and an inspired Liu Kang in-game character skin, three exclusive art prints, a steel case, and 1,450 additional Dragon Krystals (2,700 total).

The Premium Edition includes the Kombat Pack, early access to the game beginning Sept. 14, and 1,250 Dragon Krystals (in-game currency).
The Kombat Pack will feature a Johnny Cage character skin with the likeness of famed actor and martial artist, Jean-Claude Van Damme (available at launch), early access to six new playable characters (available post-launch), and five new Kameo Fighters (available post-launch)

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Kombat Pack
description: The Kombat Pack will feature a Johnny Cage character skin with the likeness of famed actor and martial artist, Jean-Claude Van Damme. It also provides early access to six new playable characters with Omni-Man (Invincible), Quan Chi, Peacemaker (DC Peacemaker), Ermac, Homelander (The Boys) and Takahashi Takeda along with the five additional Kameo Fighters Tremor, Mavado, Janet Cage, Ferra and Khameleon.

name: Catchup
description: An original board game from a design by game designer Nick Bentley. Players try to build the largest contiguous region of their color by filling spaces on a hexagon grid. Players alternate filling tiles, usually two at a time, but the trailing player can place an extra tile.

name: Thrive
description: A digital adaptation of the 2020 board game.

name: Station to Station
description: Station to Station is a minimalist & relaxing game about building railway connections. Grab your conductor’s hat and bring the voxel-art world to life through the magic of trains!

name: LEGO Star Wars III: The Clone Wars
description:
The Saga continues. Build, battle and laugh your way across the Star Wars universe like never before! Play as Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi through a story spanning the entire Clone Wars era. LEGO Star Wars III: The Clone Wars combines epic space battles, challenging puzzles and of course, the imaginative gameplay of LEGO.

The Sith and their allies have declared war on the Jedi Council with an army of droids, and it’s up to you to stop them. With the Dark Side gathering power and entire star systems in turmoil, galactic freedom hangs in the balance.

name: Blither
description: A digital implementation of the board game.

name: Root Down
description: An original digital abstract strategy board game.

name: Bouncy Hoops
description:
Bounce, shoot, swish and slam the rock to become the king of the court in this high score arcade challenge!

Bouncy Hoops is a basketball game for all the street ballers and shot callers. The school yard ankle breakers and the downtown dagger shooters. No bricks allowed! Can you get on fire and beat your chump friends before the buzzer sounds? Step up and see.

name: Wizard of Legend 2
description: Face perilous magical trials in the fast-paced rogue-lite follow-up to the acclaimed original, featuring up to 4-player co-op and vibrant new 3D visuals. Master new Arcana and elements, experiment with spell combinations, and seek immortality to become a Wizard of Legend!

name: Argus
description: This caped superhero game is a very rare unreleased prototype. The game was originally called 'Protector' (the official test name was 'VideoMan'). Tom wanted Gottlieb to get the Superman license but they didn't. 'VideoMan' was too close to 'SuperMan' so they went with 'Protector', but the name was also changed at one point to 'Guardian', and then 'Argus' (designers' joke name became 'ProVidGuardArgus').

name: Cataclismo
description: The Cataclismo left us broken. Construct fortresses and defend against waves of Horrors in this mix of tower defense and real-time strategy. Lead an expedition beyond the gates of the last city, and reclaim mist-shrouded ruins as you rebuild humanity—stone by stone.

name: Lost Skies
description: Lost Skies is a cooperative survival adventure for 1–6 players set amongst the clouds, in a vast sky of floating islands. Find and craft ancient technology, build your own skyship, brave ferocious storms, and battle giant threats that await beyond the horizon.

name: Spellarium
description: That's the first game in the successful Spellarium series. It has Solitaire, Spot the Difference levels in addition to the Match 3 levels, plus a beautiful location to build.

name: Axe Me Down
description: An Indie Platform Battler where your main objective is to push your friends off the screen with throwing Axes. Available for two to six players.

name: Pegdrop Hearts
description: A relaxing Peggle-like game with a cozy and emotional theme that will warm your heart, while you learn about love and self-respect. It's a relaxing Pachinko game for you to chill.

name: Canvas Menagerie
description: A slice of life boys love romance about a group of TV actors going through their mid-20s together.

name: Baseball Superstars 2023
description:
The fun never stops in Baseball Superstars 2023!
This time, we've got three friends from Com2uS's Minigame Party join Baseball Superstars as trainers!
Meet these adorable trainers who know how to hit massive home runs and throw incredible pitches!

name: Golf With Your Friends: Corrupted Forest Course
description: An unusual meteor strike has seeped corruption into our beloved Forest. Journey through the challenging 9-hole course and delve into the dark side of the woods. Can you complete the course under-par and earn the exclusive crown?

name: Arcade Paradise: Vostok Inc. Pinball
description: Do you like money? How about Arcades? Then you'll LOVE Vostok Inc. Pinball!!

name: LetterStealth
description: Go on a stealthy mission disguising yourself as a letter.

name: The Smurfs 2: The Prisoner of the Green Stone
description: With your crack team and the help of the SmurfoMix, liberate the village of the Smurfs from the grip of the Green Stone!

name: The Wired Narrative Bundle
description:
Includes :
The Town Of Light
Martha Is Dead
Those Who Remain
Close To The Sun
The Last Worker
Deliver Us The Moon
Tin Hearts

name: Arcade Paradise: High Score Edition
description:
The Arcade Paradise High Score Edition includes
- Arcade Paradise (full game)
- All 8 Arcade Paradise DLC packs

name: Merge Survival: Wasteland
description: Hello. My name is Eden and ever since "that day", I have become alone and been living a wandering life. Due to many people's selfishness, our environment has been destroyed and became a difficult world to live in. Living alone in this world full of chaos is very exhausting and lonely. Can I possibly survive in a place like this...? Hey, you there! I think you can help me out! Could you please help me out so I can stay safe and survive in this world of misery? This is a story of people surviving in the post-apocalypse world created by environmental pollution and disasters. Merge to create survival materials, and find any new resources or hidden locations by exploring.

name: Helicopter Rescue Team Game
description:
Be a rescuer in this new and amazing helicopter game!
Use your flying skills to find missing people, put out fires and save citizens in distress.
Patrol 12 different scenarios with their own, unique characteristics.

name: SuperPower: World at War
description:
Real-time Online War Simulation Game - Super Power!
Become the President. Rule the country and conquer the world!
You can enjoy 1:1 battles. Conquer the world with allied forces to root out organized crime groups. We invite you to a new world of real-time strategy game.

name: Football Boss: Be The Manager
description:
Build and run your own football empire!
Have you always wanted to run your own football club and lead it to huge success?
In Football Boss, your dream can come true! It’s your team, your staff, your own football empire.
Create a football club from scratch and lead it to new heights…
Start as a small non-league team, take it sky high through 10 divisions to conquer the top.

name: Tap, Click ‘n Destroy
description: Tap, Click ‘n Destroy is free space mining simulator with core game mechanic of incremental clicker games with small additions of arcade elements. Tap to destroy asteroids, planets and even stars in your endless adventure across the universe. Earn money with your mining skills, improve your spaceship with various modifications and build your private space station with various modules.

name: Kase & Thyme: The Manor Rouge
description: Survival Horror text adventure with multiple paths and outcomes! Uncover the bloody, spooky ongoings at The Manor Rouge, with fiery detectives, Kase & Thyme. Find the missing child, Lancel, before it’s too late. Darkly comedic, inspired by classic B-Horror films.

name: Slappy Paddles
description:
Test your reflexes in this single player reimaging of the classic arcade tennis game.
Battle your way through 5 different levels, each offering a unique style and set of obstacles to overcome.
Between bouncing off pinball paddles, doging 8-bit style space ships, or navigating the paths of a mini-golf course, you won't be able to let your guard down for a second.

name: Slam Jump
description:
In late 2017, Jagger, a wealthy Russian Media Mogul, introduced the Slam Jump Tournament to the entire world. Warriors from all around the world applied to participate, but only the BEST qualified.
Slam Jump is a two button arcade fighting game drilled to very basic combat actions: Jumping and Kicking. No more having the screen filled with many buttons for different actions. Jumping and Kicking is all that matters and it gives rise to very intense strategic fights.

name: Give Up 2
description: You’re back, trapped for Tasselfoot’s amusement once again. Will you survive this time or will you GIVE UP?

name: Project Proxima
description: Explore a star system while surviving the harsh conditions of space and whatever lurks in the darkness.

name: Idle: Multipliers
description: An Idle game for your fun and relaxation. Multipliers based prestige system and various gameplay possibilities

name: Umbraclaw
description: Find hope in death. In Umbraclaw, take control of Kuon, a cat who dies in the mortal world and awakens in the Soulplane, the world of the dead. Brave the horrors of the underworld to reunite Kuon with his owner in this 2D action-adventure game.

name: Hi-Leg Fantasy
description: Sin descripción

name: Party Party Time: Character Skin Pack
description: Customize your character! Change up your look with over 20 different skins! Be it a ninja, clown, or astronaut, dress up in style and get ready to party!

name: Love, Death and PvP
description: From average high schooler to powerful hero—you've just become a member of the strongest party in the newest VRMMORPG, Inferno, after accidentally kill-stealing from one of the most powerful players. Join forces with a selfish but strong dark knight, a kind mage who tends to go overboard, and a self-proclaimed treasure hunter with social anxiety, and embark on a journey to defeat the final boss!

name: BBTan2
description:
BBTan2 (by 222%) was the sequel to BBTan by 111%, available for iOS and Android.

The game got delisted on the Apple App Store, but remains unlisted and still accessable with the link on the Google Play Store.

BB-Boy needs your help! Come be a hero! Swipe and Shoot balls in perfect angle! Get on the adventure using skill balls and boosters.

name: Crazy Pingoin
description: A Pengo clone.

name: Shin Megami Tensei
description:
Shin Megami Tensei is a port of the original Super Famicom game and features new highly detailed cutscenes.

The gameplay uses first-person navigation of dungeons and turn-based battles against demons. The player can recruit demons as allies by talking to them rather than fighting them, and two to three demons can be fused to create new demons.

name: Shin Megami Tensei
description:
Shin Megami Tensei is a port of the PlayStation remaster of Shin Megami Tensei. This port adds new events that provides more backstory to the story. However, this port also has washed out colors and lower quality music than its PlayStation counterpart, due to hardware capabilities of Game Boy Advance. This is the only version of Shin Megami Tensei that got an official English localization with its iOS release.

The gameplay uses first-person navigation of dungeons and turn-based battles against demons. The player can recruit demons as allies by talking to them rather than fighting them, and two to three demons can be fused to create new demons.

name: Pinball Dreams Deluxe
description: Pinball Dreams Deluxe includes an enhanced version of Pinball Dreams and its sequel with higher resolution (640x350) and Redbook audio tracks.

name: Shin Megami Tensei
description:
Shin Megami Tensei is a port of the original Super Famicom game. This port adds a new intro, new demons, enhanced graphics, and some presentation tweaks.

The gameplay uses first-person navigation of dungeons and turn-based battles against demons. The player can recruit demons as allies by talking to them rather than fighting them, and two to three demons can be fused to create new demons.

name: Pokemon Flux
description: Altera is a wild and diverse region that overflows with abundance as well as danger. It is also the only place in the Pokémon world that emanates large amounts of Flux energy, a potent resource that has many uses. The value and power of this resource led to rapid economic growth of the region. However, shortly after humans began tapping into Flux energy for power, reports started to emerge about vicious, powered-up Pokémon appearing: the Alter Pokémon.

name: Pokémon Sage
description:
Pokémon Sage is an upcoming role-playing video game and Pokémon fangame developed by members of the 4chan board /vp/.

It takes place in a fictional region called Urobos. Urobos is loosely based on Central and South America, with many Pokémon, though not all, being related to the real-life region.

name: The Wonderful One: After School Hero
description:
A standalone version of the free DLC for The Wonderful 101: Remastered made as a crowdfunding stretch goal.

As the latest member of the centinels, new recruit Luka delivers remarkable achievements. What challenges did he need to overcome to become the prestigious Wonder Goggles? This is a story of love, battle, and growth. Experience Luka's journey to becoming a full-fledged hero!

name: Crazy Frog Racer
description: Sin descripción

name: WD-40 Game
description: A free 2001 advergame for members of the "WD-40 Fan Club". Largely forgotten about until 2022, when someone posted about it on the r/lostmedia subreddit, and a copy was located on the wayback machine.

name: C'est La Vie
description: C'est La Vie is a Japanese adventure about an aspiring young painter, who is more interested in pretty, young, naked models than in the art itself.

name: Electric Device Marian
description: Psyluth Decker is a young English nobleman. Upon hearing the news of his father's death, he goes to the family mansion, a place surrounded by strange rumors, from which he tried to distance himself. Shortly after his arrival the young man notices that almost everyone he encounters has a secret, and becomes involved in a battle between powerful shapeshifters and mechanical creatures, aided by the trusty maid Marian.

name: Imitation ha Aisenai
description: In the near future, female fertility decreased, so "imitation women" were created to solve this problem. 20 years later, the fertility values normalized, and "imitation women" lost their existential value. Android women were all stunning beauties, so women's organizations conspired to eliminate this threat. The protagonist is a first class android hunter D who is now given a new task to find three runaway imitation women.

name: Gal Pani X
description: A Qix clone in vein of Gals' Panic, where one must draw lines in the screen to unveil images featuring fanart of characters from To Heart. Unlike Gals' Panic, the images are not sexually explicit, though some are suggestive. In addition, it features other additions to the Qix formula, such as the ability to move diagonally and bullet hell elements.

name: GameFutebol
description: GameFutebol is a soccer game developed by Webcore Games and published by Globo, featuring the top 25 teams in Brazil and making them do penalties, dribbles, and much more.

name: Terra: Destino Final
description: Terra: Destino Final is a racing game between spaceships based around one of the characters of the soap opera Começar de Novo, where you can participate in exciting space disputes, compete against the computer or play online against other competitors with eight spaceships and nine worlds full of challenges and fantastic scenarios.

name: Puzzle Boy
description: Puzzle Boy is a port of the Game Boy title Kwirk, but features more and different levels along with changed graphics. In contrast to the original version, the perspective is straight top-down and there is no undo-function.

name: Coryphaeus Championships
description: Coryphaeus Championships is a competitive card game platform that passionately focuses on openly accessible professional play for all. Immerse in endless competitions and become a tournament champion!

name: Toad's Treasure Quest
description: Toad’s Treasure Quest is a Super Mario Bros. rom hack based around the character Toad. The hack provides a fanmade explanation on how Toad was able to possess all the items in the Toad Houses in Super Mario Bros. 3.

name: 2048 8x8
description: A modified version of 2048 which increases the board size from 4x4 to 8x8.

name: Men on the Flying Trapeze
description:
A two player version of The Amazing Flying Brothers.
You play as the infamouse flying brothers as they try to perform the flying trapeze act. The game is a two player coop game. Your job is to get as big of a score as you can.

name: Polytope
description: A fast-paced rhythm-esque game by ubuntor about matching key presses to reshape a constantly ebbing glob of sci-fi goo. A gameplay observation of the Nelder-Mead method, a numerical method used to find the minimum or maximum of an objective function in a multidimensional space.

name: Karate
description: Karate is a video game for the Atari 2600 originally published by Ultravision in 1982 for NTSC systems, then re-released in the latter half of the 1980s by Froggo. Supposedly the game was designed by black belt Joseph Amelio. In 1991, Digital Press chose Karate as one of the worst Atari 2600 games of all time.

name: Winds of Destiny
description: Few manage to be masters of their destiny. Many give in to duty, others try to rebel and fail in the attempt. What will be your case? Dare, find out. You could say you were leading a normal life, but you always felt different from the rest. You returned from Canada to your hometown after Mom passed away. But everything changed radically the day you met Ceina, (ex) Queen of Heaven. What does your help ask to stop his sister, his counterpart, Satanichia. To do this, you must train and strengthen your powers in a very unique and erotic way. While you continue working in an exclusive Women's Academy, and caring for the little family you still have. Will you be able to fulfill your destiny? From protecting the people you care about? Which path will you choose?

name: Putt Party
description: Putt Party is a putting golf game that you can play with your friends! Play through themed courses simultaneously as you try to get your ball in the hole in the fewest amount of strokes. Scattered throughout the courses are power-ups that can be used to make your shots easier, or your opponent’s shots harder. Players who complete the course in the fewest amount of strokes are the winners!

name: Sketch Heads
description:
In Sketch Heads, players sketch pictures of a word prompt to get others to guess the prompt correctly.

Sketch Heads has two game modes: Classic and Blitz. Classic mode is a competitive battle against your friends where you take turns choosing a secret word to draw while everyone else competes to guess it as fast as possible! Blitz mode is a chaotic, cooperative race against the clock where you split into two teams, Drawers and Guessers. Drawers share a canvas and rapidly draw words while the Guessers guess as many as possible before the time runs out.

name: King K Roller
description: Roll around as everyone's favorite regal reptile, King K Rool. Collect 5 Remy Coins per level to proceed to the next level, ultimately leading you up to the final boss.

name: King K Roller 2
description:
Everyone's favorite regal reptile returns in a brand new adventure.

King K Rool is nothing but a meme character; at least that's what his peers think of him. This inferiority complex drives his attempt to alter the course of history to be seen than more than just a "meme character". Luckily, after finding a time stone, the crocodile is able to embark on this adventure of altering the past.

This adventure includes 9 rage-inducing levels, jam packed with difficult jumps, engaging boss battles, and captivating cutscenes.

This game is for god gamers only. It is very difficult, and is intentionally rage inducing, but it is much more fair than the previous installment of King K Roller (which I recommend you do not play).

name: Fatman Adventures
description:
The game puts you in control of Fatman, a treasure hunter who discovers a mystery forest mentioned in ancient legends. On his way to collecting all the treasure of the sacred woods Fatman will have to face cruel monsters guarding precious diamonds and rubies.

Fatman will have to outsmart his enemies by digging traps-holes, setting cage-traps and using magic items.

name: Deadenders
description: A text adventures with illustrations, a parody on the TV series the Eastenders.

name: Dragon Slayer
description: Sin descripción

name: Enjoy the Diner
description: Why not enjoy the diner? The moon is as full as it'll ever be, and there's even a drink fountain.

name: Dread Dawn
description: This is an open world Zombie Survival game, The location of the game is set in the city. You are forced to stay in the city because you can't catch up with the evacuation team. You need to defend the camp with other survivors who stay in the city and survive.

name: Densha-zukuri no Popo
description: This is a story about creating trains.

name: 2048 9x9
description: Merge the tiles together to make the 2048 tile, however this time in a 9x9 grid.

name: Heart of Sengoku
description: Develop the warring countries of Japan, collect tea utensils, warlords, and cultural figures, steal the country, and take over the country. Easy, original historical collection game.

name: 1 or 3 Addictive Puzzle Game
description: 1 or 3 Addictive Puzzle Game is a puzzle game.

name: Out of the World
description: "In this world, "only what you see" is true." This game is a 2.5D platformer puzzle action game in which objects seen by the character materialize and disappear from existence when the character meditates.

name: Wizardry: The Five Ordeals - The Absence of Misericordia
description:
It has been two years now, and the endless winter has not once relented, leaving many stranded in the settlement of Winternadir. The fur merchants come to the adventurers with a request...
The villagers often speak of a place of worship in the heart of a nearby valley. It was once home to "The Relic of Our Lady of Mercy", which was said to have kept the cold weather at bay. The relic is long since lost, and the valley has been abandoned. You must retrieve this relic, and return the region to its natural state.

name: Elebeater VR
description: A game that makes you feel like an elevator.

name: Songs of the Hmong
description: The culture of Chinese Hmong nationality boasts pluralistic artistry, and it has its own uniqueness in construction, literature, painting, patterns, craft, etc. However their ways of inherit the knowledge is limited due to the absence of written language. In present days, the younger generation is showing a huge passion about video games, thus demonstrating a possibility for young people to grow interest on these fading traditional cultures by binding them with the Ninth Art.

name: Iromaze Ink Shop
description:
Elozen Ink Store, an ink store that packs and ships mysterious ink inks into bottles.
Ink stunt'Ink-chan' has a habit of getting happy when he shows the same color as himself and enters the bottle.
Be careful, multiple ink dolls can appear at the same time, and at this time you have to show all the colors of the ink ink mixed in.
Get the correct colors fast before the ink gets away!

name: Kotonoha Lernado
description: Let us exchange the KOTONOHA of hope a little more. *Ĉu vi volas paroli la lingvon "Juliamo"?* Do you want to speak *Juliamo*?

name: Zakuro
description: A heartfelt but bloody tale about monsters known as the angels, appears in the cold ruins of Shinjuku.

name: Soulchemist Renafine
description: In the game, players will follow the journey of ‘Soulchemist’ Renafine, who has to strengthen the soul of the monsters in order to defeat the army of the Great Demon King.

name: Monster Fishing
description: Go on a trip to find monster fish all over the world! A fishing RPG that saves lives while you fish!

name: QubiQuest: Castle Craft
description: QubiQuest: Castle Craft is a game where players build huge castles in an ancient war-torn world and defend them against hordes of enemies in chaotic siege battles of epic proportions. Castle Craft is a unique blend of voxel sandbox, action, and horde defence.

name: Anti-World Island
description: Sin descripción

name: Looper Tactics
description: A deck build game that combines the essence of Metrovania. The ancient empire created a world in a box and realized artificial souls. Fearing that it would bring destruction to the world, it was sealed and an endless cycle of reincarnation was set up to ensure its eternal isolation.

name: Romp of Dump
description: Visual Novel with Live2D Animation, Observing Scum Prisoners! In a prison called a dump, a betting card game among dangerous prisoners begins. Penalty game for the losers! Uncover the hidden pasts and bizarre crimes of these lunatics!

name: Fish or Chicken
description: In this game you need to utilize your time carefully if you wanna reach the highest area!

name: Dance Dance Revolution
description: A Tiny Arcade port of Dance Dance Revolution.

name: Skyhood's Innocent Six
description: This game has three scenarios and three raising modes. It's a deckbuilding adventure game.

name: Deep Sea Sweep
description: A cute 2d platformer where you clean the ocean floor of filthy treasure chests.

name: The Book of Warriors
description: The Book of the Warriors is a retro SLG+ roguelike game. As a fan of SLG, have you been looking for a kind of war chess that can build a variety of fancy Bulid? Start the game! You will find the charm of SLG~

name: RabbitConquest
description: In this game rabbits rule civilization.

name: Magical Magic World
description: Pixel art side-scrolling comical fantasy magical action sent by Vtuber magical girl!! This game is an orthodox side-scrolling 2D action game.You can experience various worlds from the beginning with the stage selection type.

name: Rainbow Witch
description: In this game you can not attack. You will have to send back the bullets that are coming your way!

name: Tokyo Pinball
description: A retro high-speed action game in which you can compete with your friends.

name: Droptic
description:
Select column, drop block and see what happen.

Fill bars above to explode rocks.

Get the highest score you can.

name: Lunatic Den
description:
"Welcome to the Madman's Den"

A horror ADV in which you interact with strange and amusing residents while developing a town.
Play time is about 4-5 hours.

name: MazyMazes
description: A story about a party of adventurers who seek an amethyst which a god of the earth is sealed in.

name: Candyhouse
description: Throw candy at your enemy but try not to get hit!

name: FreshCharge Ruru
description: Defeat all the enemies on the stage with a deadly flying kick. Flying kicks gain momentum by charging. If you can achieve it before this falls down, the stage is cleared. Please try to clear all.

name: Qwert: A New Type of Word Game!
description:
Fire up the typewriter and stretch your fingers because it’s time to play Qwert – a new type of word game!
Think outside the grid in fast-paced multiplayer matches and solo games that challenge you to rack your brain for the highest scoring words you can. In Qwert, there are no letter tiles, just you, your brain and the keyboard. Battle opponents in a real-time war of words or fly solo to beat your personal best!

name: With Mountain Smiling
description: The Antarctic expedition in this game is still about extreme cold and darkness, but there is a guarantee of safe return, the danger is not so much constant as it is ever-present, and the new arrivals were not men.

name: Photon: Planet Regenerator
description:
Connect the falling meteorites and blow them up,
Defense + neglect training game.

name: Toyforming
description: In Toyforming, your drawings will come to three-dimensional life with the power of artificial intelligence (AI) and will inhabit a planet all of your own making. Your 3D artwork will have a mind of its own and interact with its surroundings. Turn on AR Mode to merge reality with your toyformed reality!

name: Anomalous City
description: Anomalous City is an adventure game inspired by SCP and Cthulhu mythology.

name: Space Recall
description: "Space Recall" is a 2D horizontal board game with action Roguelike structure, skill and equipment combination as innovation points, and economic operation as the driving force. players can build character skills according to the situation, and at the same time with special abilities

name: Soukaishin
description:
Is running away the only thing you can do? A horror ADV game in which you are helplessly tossed about by the malice that relentlessly looms over you.

When you wake up, you find yourself in an abandoned hospital. You can't even remember why you're here. Can you solve the mysteries of the hospital and escape alive while avoiding the looming dangers?

name: Keribato
description: Nikke, the goddess of victory kick through the monster packed dungeon. Keribato is a puzzle RPG game.

name: Yog-Sothoth's Yard
description: Manage a hotel and hire employees including Death, a dragon, a Demon-Slayer, and a bioroid maid. Build your wealth through various means and refine your strategies based on the predictions of Oracles. Your choices will determine which employees become enamored with you.

name: LoveSoTea
description: Tea-making simulator meets adventure game meets visual novel in the modern tale that is LoveSoTea. Once you complete it, you'll know how to brew the most delicious tea... maybe. No promises.

name: My Child: Lebensborn Remastered
description:
My Child Lebensborn is a story driven nurture game based on true events. Play as the adoptive parent of Karin or Klaus, and experience the struggles they go through along them.
In My Child Lebensborn Remastered, we are providing more opportunities for you to create more memories with your child, even at the face of tragedy.

name: House Hopper
description:
House Hopper is a challenging, stylised 3D, precision platformer where you jump through house-themed levels in a minigolf-ish fashion to collect keys to all the rooms, find all playable everyday-use objects and beat your high scores while avoiding falling, crashing and getting burned the best you can at the same time.
Jump. Fall. Crash. Repeat!

name: Passpartout 2: The Lost Artist - Special Edition
description: Passpartout 2: The Lost Artist has you back in the painting smock of your favorite green painter as you try to make a name for yourself in the art community by selling out your personal works for art that you create using an MS paint style interface.

name: Chloe’s Requiem: Encore
description:
Chloe’s Requiem is a Japanese 2D adventure game, filled with mysteries and surprises. The young creator, in her teens, created the original game, inspired by free game titles such as The Witch’s House and Ao Oni.

From the original release in 2013, the graphics and sounds have all been completely revamped, allowing all players, new and returning, to have a fresh experience with the game.

In Chloe’s Requiem -encore-, the side story -con amore- is also included, which can be played after the player finishes the original story. Players who have played the game in the past can enjoy the updated art and graphics.

name: Boyhood's End
description: Boyhood's End is an adventure game following Giovanni, the boy with the lowest human score in the universe, and Campanella, the delinquent genius, and their journey on the galactic railroad regarding the "human" and "inhuman".

name: Thalassa: Edge of the Abyss
description: Uncover the mystery of Thalassa, a first-person psychological drama set under the sea. Ill-fate has fallen on your former crew and friends and it’s up to you to find answers onboard the wreckage. Experience the melancholic underwater journey of human stories facing life and loss.

name: Dream Channel Zero
description: Dive into a glitched-out game world! Explore synthwave skylines, fight freaky phantoms, and meet a whole host of quirky characters in this hysterically surreal adventure!

name: Never Grave: The Witch and the Curse
description: A Metroidvania x Roguelite, where you advance using a cursed hat. Use a variety of magic or possess your enemies to reach the lowest levels! Bring back loot, build new facilities in your village, make a living and strengthen yourself for the next battle! Supports up to 4-player multiplayer.

name: 4 Soccer Simulators
description: 4 Soccer Simulators (later also released as Pro Soccer Simulator) is a collection of four soccer video games developed and released by Codemasters in 1988. It included four games; 11-a-Side Soccer, Indoor Soccer, Soccer Skills and Street Soccer. The games are all played using vertical scrolling.

name: An Elaborate History of Chess
description: An Elaborate History of Chess is a crafting strategy game touring the history of Chess. In true Chess tradition build castles, explore dungeons, farm turnips and get checkmated by a tree. Find answers to Chess's darkest questions, like why the horse piece moves in an L-shape.

name: Halo Infinite: Season 4 - Infection
description: Halo Infinite Season 4 brings Infection to the game, a military career rank system, improvements to spartan customization, new maps, additional forge features, a new battlepass, and more.

name: Milky Bear: Lunch Frenzy
description: Join Milky the Bear as he sets out to run the best restaurant in town! Be it preparing Chinese food, bun, or taco, Milky is always striving to improve his cooking abilities to be the star chef - let's help him achieve his goals!

name: Puyo Puyo CD Tsuu
description: The PC-Engine CD port features full voice work with a cast consisting entirely of professional voice actors, and also includes character-unique chain phrases.

name: Celebrating Lake Xochimilco
