description: May 20th 2023’s interactive Google Doodle celebrates Lake Xochimilco, a natural lake near Mexico City that is the last remaining native habitat for axolotls in the world (cousins of the salamander). The lake was once home to the ancient Aztec civilization during the 15th century, and eventually landowners in the colonial period took over occupation of the lake. On this day in 1920, the Mexican government returned Lake Xochimilco back to the locals. Lake Xochimilco now serves as a recreational site, cultural attraction, and home to the rare axolotl species.

name: Championship Rally
description: Championship Rally is a top-down racing game. The player can choose to control real rally cars: Toyota Celica, Nissan Pulsar, Lancia Delta, and others. There are three modes in the game: time attack, high speed rally, and "adventure mode", which takes the player through a championship in Senegal. Each mode allows the player to select a car and customize its steering, gears, brakes, etc. Car controls are fairly simple, with one button assigned to accelerating and another to applying brakes.

name: Franz
description: An experimental game that is hard to classify in terms of genre. In the game Franz we interact in various ways with the title character, which nestled on our device. The behavior of our charge changes, depending on the ways in which we communicate with her.

name: Broken Colors
description:
Eventually, we're all just gonna break.

You are a cashier at a convenience store, depressed and lonely with your mundane life, hoping for a bit of excitement. One day you meet a peculiar stranger who's sweet and shy at first, but one kind gesture is all it takes to make him stalk admire you a bit too much and be a danger to everyone else around you. Be careful how you treat him and others, for pain and death will follow you like a shadow. But perhaps fate has other plans for you...

name: Rap Simulator
description: Rap Simulator is in basically a production with a great deal of humour. The action starts in the 80s of the last century. The player takes on the role of a rapper who sets up his first music studio in a rented apartment. Our task is to break out of the underground and become a part of the mainstream for good, opening our own label or creating the best clothing brand. Beefs, chases, money, green leaves, shootings, gang wars or maybe a softer way to success? The way the player chooses to reach the top will depend only on him/her. At the beginning of the game, the player's budget is limited, so you have to decide which aspect of the production you want to devote more attention to at the cost of the other elements.

name: Retrowave Illusions: Aesthetics Edition
description: Retrowave illusions offers above all a visual and sound experience that will delight fans of the genre and will surely make those who don't know it yet discover this wonderful universe. Retrowave Illusions is unique experience of being immersed in wonderful world for at least a few moments.

name: Cahoots
description: A digital implementation of the cooperative board game.

name: Peekaboo Lite
description: A Cross-Platform Hide & Seek online game. Players are divided into two teams: Props and Hunters. Props hide, taking the form of objects and adopting their physical properties, and hunters try with all their might to find them.

name: Treasure Hunter
description: A digital implementation of the drafting card game designed by Richard Garfield.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 7: Sin Kiske
description: Adds Sin Kiske to the roster of playable characters

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 8: Bedman?
description: Adds Bedman? to the roster of playable characters.

name: Classic Offensive
description: Classic Offensive is an in development community made modification for Counter-Strike: Global Offensive. CO aims to bring Counter Strike back to its roots with completely remade classic maps, character models, and weapons that hearken back to their original versions while also keeping the improvements that CS:GO has made.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 9: Asuka R♯
description: Adds Asuka R♯ to the roster of playable characters

name: Mumu's Soup Adventure
description:
Jill the candy making witch summoned a cute little ghost cat named Mumu to help her with her candy making duties.

One day, Jill decided to make soup and Mumu agreed to help. All was going well until Jill decided Mumu's heart would be a part of the recipe! Scared for his life, Mumu barges out of the house and escapes, but Jill does not intend on letting him go that easily...

During his escape, he encounters various characters and slowly uncovers the truth that ties everyone together.

name: Call of Duty 4: Promod
description: The official competition mod for CoD4, notably removing perks and Create-a-Class level restrictions, adding several QoL features and bridging the game closer to its contemporaries and past games in the series.

name: Noalone
description: Noa, a lonely young boy, is struggling to cope with his parents' relationship that seems to be falling apart.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Relics of the Past
description: A mod for The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild which changes the game to be more challenging by enhancing the map and enemy locations, being akin to an unofficial expansion for the game.

name: Nintendo 3DS Sound: Soccer
description: Nintendo 3DS Sound: Soccer is an easter egg game built into the Nintendo 3DS Sound application.

name: Tetris Mario Bros.
description: A Tetris themed puzzle rom hack for the original Super Mario Bros.

name: We Are Out of Food, Milton.
description: "We Are Out of Food, Milton." is a visual novel/walking sim about having to go to the grocery store even though you really don't want to.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - Islands Expansion
description: A mod for The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild which adds new maps in the form of floating islands across Hyrule.

name: Insane Kart Wii
description: Insane Kart Wii is a custom track distribution for Mario Kart Wii which adds 3,584 new tracks to the game. It is currently the biggest custom track distribution for Mario Kart Wii.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - Hyrule Rebalance
description: Sin descripción

name: Dark Army Resurrection
description: Sin descripción

name: Just Dance: Vitality School
description: Just Dance: Vitality School was a Chinese exclusive game in the Just Dance series. The game served as a replacement for Just Dance Now for Chinese markets and featured various exclusive songs from Chinese musicians.

name: Just Dance 2023 Edition
description: A cancelled Google Stadia port of Just Dance 2023 Edition was announced at the game's initial reveal during an Ubisoft Forward, however due to the fail of the Google Stadia the game would never come out after the announcement of the discontinuation of the console coming 2 months before the games release.

name: Disney Tsum Tsum Stadium
description: Tsum Tsum Stadium is a puzzle game where you have to compete against 50 rivals to see who can clear their characters off the board the quickest.

name: Ai to Yume no Kuni Sanrio Puroland Asobinagara Oboeyou! Hiragana Katakana
description: A Sega Pico game featuring characters created by Sanrio.

name: Ai to Yume no Kuni Sanrio Puroland: Chanto Dekirukana? Minna to Tanoshii Oyuugikai
description: A Japan-only Sanrio-themed Sega Pico game, released on May 1, 1998.

name: Ai to Yume to Bouken Sanrio Puroland!
description: Ai to Yume to Bouken Sanrio Puroland! is a Japan-only Sanrio-themed Sega Pico game.

name: Pow Vista
description:
Discover the ultimate multiplayer skateboarding adventure!

Join players across the world who are training their skills, earning mythic drops, and exploring the world of Pow Vista.

name: And I Saw the Stars Falling Down...
description:
A woman narrates the story of a family and the abuse behind, and how everyone tries to convince you it's not their fault. But you don't know who to believe. You can't even trust the narrator. Especially the narrator.

A drama/mystery visual novel around 15k words, including 20 CGs with over 13 variations in total. Bonus content for people who decide to use accessibility tools (Turn off animations & Sound Captions)!

There's also a secret (horror?) route hidden in the game!

name: Astro Wars
description:
Italian license from Data East's "Astro Fighter".

Player steers fighter craft and fires missiles and endeavors to eliminate attacking forces. Each stage of the game becomes more difficult, with each fighter craft moving closer into the battle.

name: Atari 4 Player Football
description: 4-player version of Atari Football.

name: Puyo Puyo CD
description: A PC-Engine port of the first Puyo Puyo game. Includes full voice acting for cutscenes, in addition to exclusive scenes that play when the difficulty is set to Hardest. Most notably, it also allows both players to choose who they want to play as, making all of the characters playable (except everybody after Witch).

name: Puyo Puyo Sun
description: Puyo Puyo Sun also as Puyo Puyo 3 is the third installment of the Puyo Puyo game series. The game was initially developed for the Sega Saturn-based ST-V arcade hardware in 1996. The game's title and emphasis on the sun is a play on the Japanese word for the number three, san.

name: Formula One
description: A formula One management game.

name: Fuddo & Slam
description: A text adventure inspired on the Lord of the Rings books.

name: Fatum Betula + Food Truck Tycoon
description: Immerse yourself in a world of magic and culinary mastery with the enchanting Fatum Betula + Food Truck Tycoon Bundle on Xbox!

name: Daymare Stray
description: Help Daymare Folk find the stray. Who is the stray? Well, see for yourself.

name: Daedalus Versus Minotaur
description: An asymmetric multiplayer maze game of fast-paced building and solving!

name: You'll Stay Here Forever
description: Proxima Centauri b was discovered on August 24, 2016. The rovers sent to the planet are not responding. It turned out that the planet's atmosphere does not allow radio signals to pass through. You have been sent to the planet's surface to find them.

name: Survivors Will
description: This is a casual Roguelike game that allows characters to become stronger and stronger through repeated choices, breaking free from the heavy siege of monsters!

name: The Adventures of Nerdstan
description: Join Nerdstan In His Ultimate Adventures to save the NerdDom. Defeat Enemies, Collect Coins, Navigate Platforms and Face Powerful Bosses.

name: The Wonderful 101: Remastered - The Wonderful One: After School Hero - Part 1
description:
Get ready for a unique side-scrolling experience in the world of The Wonderful 101: Remastered! This free DLC lets you enjoy a brand new episode in which you experience Luka's story!

As the latest member of the CENTINELS, new recruit Luka delivers remarkable achievements. What challenges did he need to overcome to become the prestigious Wonder Goggles? This is a story of love, battle, and growth. Experience Luka's journey to becoming a full-fledged hero!

name: Traffic Racer Highway Online
description: Multiplayer highway car racing, with amazing missions, daily event , and Friends Challenge

name: Quick Thief
description: Quick Thief is the simplest 2D game in which you have to steal things and sell them and try not to get in the eyes of the guards.

name: How Many Deaths to Clear?
description: "How many deaths to clear?" is a time attack game where you compete to clear the game as quickly as possible while keeping your death count as low as possible. Try to clear the game as fast as you can without dying too much, and enjoy the thrilling sensation that comes with it.

name: Elven Rivers 2: New Horizons - Collector's Edition
description: Celene and her brave teammates have already earn a reputation for themselves: this is why they were chosen to be the first group to explore the neighbouring continent of beastmen.

name: The Diary
description: Several diaries gradually reveal the thrilling story of a missing case; after multiple deductions, are the answers in the past or present? With frequent plot twists, you never know which is the truth and which is the unexpected; in a dense fog, time buries the past, but the marks remain.

name: Delven
description: Explore the subterranean depths of an infinite 2D world and discover unique biomes, monsters, artifacts and more. Build your base to gather and manage resources. Fight bosses in tactical, turn-based battles and unlock dazzling and powerful loot!

name: Citadale Resurrection: Prelude to War
description: DLC for Citadale Resurrection. Prelude to War is an early 1990s handheld styled action platformer.

name: Tad the Lost Explorer and the Emerald Tablet: Craziest and Madness Edition
description: Embark with Tad and his friends on a new journey through different cities where you will encounter challenging puzzles in your quest to get the emerald tablet.

name: Summer Daze: Tilly's Tale
description: A funny and charming visual novel adventure. Be a rogue among heroes in this professionally voiced fantasy story!

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Director's Cut
description: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Director's Cut is your path into the world of adorable delicacies! Use different drawing tools and have some tasty fun!

name: Burger Chef Tycoon: Co-op Edition
description:
Tasty burgers? Only in here!
Like going out to town for a snack? Everybody does!

But perhaps you'd like to see that from the other side?
Not everyone can, so don't waste the opportunity!

Manage the preparation of burgers, fries, crispy chicken and a multitude of other treats!

name: That's a Cow: Premium Edition
description: Soar through the air and don't get milked in this cute game.

name: Swords & Bones: Complete Edition
description: Grab the sword and defend the Kingdom of Vestus in an adventure full of action in the spirit of classic retro games.

name: Boreal Tenebrae: Deluxe Extended Edition
description: Boreal Tenebrae will take you on a retro-style adventure, with a mysterious atmosphere and horror elements. The game is inspired by 90s classics and the best TV series.

name: UnderDungeon: Deluxe Edition
description: Bundle contains the game + a soundtrack!

name: Foodie Avenue
description: Build a town filled with restaurants from all over the world in Foodie Avenue. You’ll cook food from all cultures using ingredients produced by your own town. Create a world famous food destination and earn money by completing food orders from visiting foodies.

name: FA Tetris
description: A South Korean only version of Tetris for the Sega Master System.

name: Velocity 2X: Critical Urgency DLC Pack
description:
So you’ve perfected the art of teleporting at high speed? Then you’re ready for the Critical Urgency Pack!

Six obsessively fine-tuned speed run levels that will push your teleporting skills beyond the limits of your imagination and into the realm of gaming magic.

Master these levels to dazzle your friends and scare your family with freakish talent.

name: John Cena’s Sexy High School Adventure
description: Fucco-san has had enough of being bullied, so he hopes that in his new school, he'll make lots of friends! Will he be the most popular student? Can he make it in time for prom?

name: Velocity 2X: Dual Core DLC Pack
description:
So those last few levels tickled your gamer hindbrain? Then it's time for Dual Core.

Control two Quarp Jets at once to weave, blast and race through 10 mind-melting levels at the heart of Paroika Prime, the Vokh Citadel.

Master these levels to upgrade your essential motor neurons, enhance your stimulus processing and gain a deeper capacity for intense spatial challenge.

name: Normal Shmup
description: Normal Shmup is a strange shoot em' up game based around classic gameplay. Fight the enemies and regain control of the world again.

name: PokerTH
description: PokerTH is an open-source Texas hold 'em simulator that runs on Windows, Mac OS X, Linux, and Android. PokerTH is written in C++ using the Qt framework and allows for up to ten human players, with computer-controlled players filling in if there are not enough humans. Players can also play against other PokerTH users online.

name: Velocity 2X: Daily Sprint
description:
Originally part of the Xbox and PC release of the game, it was planned as a DLC for PlayStation but was added as a free update after the AGDQ Speed Run of Velocity 2X.

The mode features platforming sections of the game in a randomly generated order with a practice option to see the new layout each day but only one chance to finish the level with a high score for the leaderboards.

name: Sphereout
description: An arcade puzzle game about arranging 3d blocks on a sphere.

name: Waifu Space Conquest
description: Kill the aliens and enjoy the cyberpunk aesthetic

name: Bee in the Valley
description: Be Like a Bee: Fly, Collect, and Attack in a Buzzing Journey through the Undiscovered Valleys!

name: Fish Party Online
description: Fish Party Online is an exciting and enjoyable Online Party game. Perfect for the casual gamer! Play single player mode to master your skills or play online against other players. A great entertaining game for friends and family!

name: Think Shift
description: If you like solving Rubix cube, jigsaw puzzles or sliding puzzles, then Think Shift is for you. Base on the simple mechanic of sliding puzzle, Think Shift will provide endless hours of puzzle solving.

name: Zombie Run HD
description: Help awaken Zombies to escape from The Rusty Mug, a bar accidentally built atop an old temple cemetery.

name: Binary Rush
description:
Binary Rush is a simple but challenging game that will mess with your head and test your reflexes!
Tap left and right to control both dots in their endlessly scrolling virtual world while avoiding obstacles.

name: Mush Rush: Stock Market Tycoon
description:
Welcome to Shroom Land!
A stock market paradise waiting to be discovered! Play as Shroomy, a young mushroom who hopes to achieve financial freedom by investing in the psychedelic stock market. Equipped with several tools to make sound investment decisions, Shroomy ventures into the vast world of stock trading. With the loving support of his family and neighbours, Shroomy is destined for success in the market!

name: Urban Flow: Silver Edition
description: Immerse yourself in a beautiful, hand-crafted, low-poly world to discover the enormous satisfaction of watching the hundreds of tiny, colorful cars flowing through the streets – all while listening to the chill, urban music.

name: Theft Ride Legacy
description: Gear up for the ultimate treasure hunt on wheels!

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S: Numberlink
description:
Intuitive puzzle where you draw lines
to connect the same numbers.

name: Sudoku: Casual Board Game
description:
Sudoku is a very old puzzle for training the mind, logic and attentiveness!
Sudoku is the oldest and very popular mindfulness puzzle! There are riddles for every taste - from the simplest to the most complex. And if the task is beyond your power, then you can always use the hints that will help in solving the puzzle.

Pleasant music and colorful graphics will allow you to immerse yourself in the game, completely relax and have a good rest. Forget about paper sudoku, now the puzzle will always be with you on your device! Train your brain, develop logic and mindfulness!

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Silver Edition
description:
Game includes:
15+ Stages
30+ Weapons

name: Bubble Bird
description: Bubble Bird is a simple yet addictive game that is great for both adults and kids to play. She perfectly develops reaction and the ability to make quick decisions.

name: Runner Roy
description: Runner Roy is a sidescroller platformer where you have to count both on your skills and luck to overcome (and survive!) as many machines and obstacles along the way as you can.

name: Stages of Life
description: Follow the journey of a girl from childhood to old age in "Stages of Life," an exciting puzzle-adventure game. Overcome challenges and reflect on your choices in a vibrant world with an inspiring soundtrack. Try it now and discover the meaning of life!

name: Cross Impact
description: Cross Impact is an indie crossover platform fighting game, featuring a diverse cast of iconic characters, multiple modes, and a fully-fledged training mode to perfect your moves. Gather your friends for local & online matches! Prepare to Make Your Impact!

name: Rhythm Planet
description: Rhythm Planet is a cute and hilarious game developed by Aoga Technology and published by Gamepoch Star Journey. The game perfectly combines music rhythm with new features of PSVR2, such as adaptive triggers, head-mounted vibration feedback, and surround sound, allowing players to enjoy the fun on dozens of "super parties".

name: Mobilization
description: First person shooter. Light humor, dynamics and action will allow you to return to the atmosphere of first-person shooters of the 90s.

name: Fantasy World TD
description: Defend and defeat enemies by defending worlds

name: Tracks of Triumph
description: Dive into this shell-shocked, fast-paced, top-down adventure and help Shiny the Tank clear out his battlegrounds and get rid of all enemy contraptions!

name: Barrett Foster: Chapter One
description:
Barrett Foster a realistic puzzle game in which you play the famous inspector solving a dramatic personal investigation: The disappearance of Emma and Gabriel, close friends of Barrett.

Explore your environment and solve different puzzles to progress and find answers !

name: Presences: Dark Awakening
description: Explore a dark reality, discover a forgotten ritual, interact with the world around you, solve ancient puzzles, platform treacherous underground chambers, and feel the terror. Survive the night in this interactive haunted house narrative adventure from a first-person perspective.

name: Project Hypnagogia
description: An experiment set up by a mad scientist called "Hypnagogia" to reveal absolute fear by revealing the subject's most terrifying images into reality. The line between dream and reality is blurred. It's not easy to find a way out when there's only one scary dream going on around you.

name: Real Riders
description:
The classic is back, stronger than ever! Enjoy the best physics simulation over two wheels and the best graphics.
Real Riders. Completely free without in-app purchases. Beat your friends on the scoreboards.
An indie game that will make you dream with impossible speeds.

name: Ridiculous Triathlon
description:
Run, swim and drive in ridiculous ways in this is amazing runner!
Ridiculous Triathlon is the story of 3 characters that put their forces together to be able to compete in a triathlon!
They form a perfect trio but on their own they would not have any chance to win the competition!
They need you to help them dodge all the obstacles and pass the different stages of the game!
In this original, innovative and ridiculous endless runner game visit different cities of the world such as Barcelona, London & Tokyo!
Travel these emblematic cities in the three triathlon stages that include running, cycling and swimming!
Each of the different triathlon stages have their own funny and simple dynamics and controls!

name: Spaceship Running Dudu
description: _ This game get idea from endless running game.

name: Against War: Medieval
description:
Take the enemy tower down and defeat their commander!
You can use siege hammers, trebuchets, siege towers, and other siege weapons that suits your strategy to destroy the enemy's castles.
You can also send soldiers to climb up the walls and take out the enemy commander.
Try out various strategies!

name: Dungeon Burglars
description: Dungeon Burglars is a 'manual' tower defence game with a minimalist pixel art graphical style. Gameplay involves buying and placing traps and then tapping to activate them. The normal mode is quite short, so it's perfect for killing time on your commute.

name: Escape Blythe Castle
description:
Escape Blythe Castle is a level based, adventure & puzzle escape game. Each room has a story to tell, and there are many tricky puzzles to solve.
The story begins in modern day Europe on Castle grounds. The Princess gets wind of distressing news regarding the King's sudden disappearance. The Kingdom has suddenly fallen under attack!

Without haste, you are instructed by Queen Beatrice to flee to the Castle's long kept secret rooms & embark on a dangerous quest to solve the puzzles within, and escape each room ... No one has ever set foot in this part of the Castle... you are the brave & privileged first visitor.

The only way you can save the Kingdom is to gain access to a priceless family heirloom, buried deep within the Castle.

name: Block Breakerz
description:
Block Breakerz is a fast paced, 4 player, arcade game that blends Breakout and Hungry Hungry Hippos into a party game you just can't stop playing.
Compete solo or against up to three of your friends in 4 different game modes that will have you playing ‘just one more round’ for hours on end.
Block Breakerz is a frantic and fun game for the whole family that you can play anytime and anywhere on your iPad!.

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - IVECO BUS Bus Pack
description:
Attention all Angel Shores and Seaside Valley bus drivers!
Do you want to upgrade your bus fleet - preferably with brand-new buses?
Then this is the perfect expansion pack for you!

This bus pack comes with three authentic interior designs with specifically created color patterns for the seats and appealing floor textures. Go ahead and try them out (also available in your other buses) and become the next transport trendsetter!

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - MAN Bus Pack
description:
Attention all Angel Shores and Seaside Valley bus drivers!
You want to upgrade your fleet with the content of the "Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop Extended Edition", including the fresh design of the new MAN Lion's City 12 city bus with three fancy interior sets? Then this is the perfect expansion pack for you!

name: Charon's Staircase: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: In this first-person horror mystery game, you set out to bury the horrible past of a tyrannical government. Retrieve and destroy the documents that unravel the secrets that lie beneath Oack Grove. This Digital Deluxe Edition includes a Digital Artbook and the OST.

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - VDL Bus Pack
description:
Get ready to enjoy the latest Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop expansion pack and expand your bus fleet with three new fancy buses!
This Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop - Bus Pack includes three new buses licensed from renowned manufacturer VDL Bus & Coach!

name: Knight vs Giant: The Broken Excalibur
description: Engage in combat against gigantic monsters terrorising the Kingdom of Camelot and defeat them with your Broken Excalibur in this roguelite action adventure with RPG elements.

name: Hotel Renovator: Five Star Edition
description: The Hotel Renovator Five Star Edition includes the base game and a pack of 7 DLC to be released in the upcoming months. Expand your inner designer experience with 7 packs featuring amazing decoration items that will make your hotel stand out from the rest.

name: Hotel Renovator: Futuristic Furniture Set
description: Welcome to the future of hotel interior design! Get the Futuristic Furniture Set that brings cutting-edge furnishings to your renovation toolkit. Step into the next century with sleek and stylish furniture that will transform your hotel into a high-tech heaven

name: Lost Colony
description: "Lost Colony" is a Twin-Stick Shooter Action-Roguelike set on an abandoned space colony. Guided by your drone companion, you must explore the planet and defend yourself from the swarms of aliens and the corrupted colony security system. Will you uncover the secrets of the Lost Colony?

name: Sphere Guider
description: Dark Souls but a Ball.

name: Target
description: Target is an action-packed, multiplayer game where players take control of miniature toy tanks and engage in intense battles with each other. The game is set in a variety of environments, from living rooms to backyards, or as far as what your mind can produce.

name: Search
description: Embarking on an epic journey of discovery through a huge but lifeless mechanical planet belonging to the old man. Explore dark underground complexes, fight hostile machines and silicon-based life, meet different humans, life, machines!

name: Lords of the Fallen: Deluxe Edition
description: A vast world awaits in all-new, dark fantasy action-RPG, Lords of the Fallen. As one of the fabled Dark Crusaders, embark on an epic quest to overthrow Adyr, the demon God.

name: Blackpink: The Game
description:
A whole new journey with Blackpink! Become Blackpink's producer and manage your own agency, solve puzzles to clear schedules for Blackpink.
Customize your members with stunning outfits and play mini-games with your friends in the Blackpink world.

name: Campfire Cat Cafe
description: A purrfectly relaxing game! Start your cafe in the forest. Hire adorable cat staff. Cook delicious authentic foods from around the world! Attract and serve cute animal customers and laugh at their furry funny stories. Relax and earn tips as your kitten staff works while you're idle.

name: Double View
description: Can you handle this mind-blowing experience? Control two squares across screens with different layouts and try to reach the finish line without hitting any walls or obstacles. Double View is a unique game that will push your concentration and motor skills to a whole new level. Test yourself!

name: Zewels
description:
Zewels is an addictive puzzle game experience that breaks the mold of classic puzzle games.
In Zewels Puzzle RPG, you'll need to use all your skill and intelligence to beat progressively tougher levels.
Combine gems to win magical power-ups and blast your way to victory.
Starting at level 0, there are a total of 20 levels, and 4 modes: three single player and one multiplayer.
As you gain more experience, you'll have an ever-greater advantage over your opponents.
To reach level 20, you'll need to pass a series of challenging tests in all four modes.
You can also enhance your abilities with Super Powers and Super Combos that will help you achieve maximum control of your mental powers.

name: Omega 13
description: You play as a mech pilot who survived the war. In order to find someone, you join the arena and fight to the championship. You will also meet a mysterious woman and uncover the truth about the eternal night of the planet.

name: The Centennial Case
description:
The Centennial Case: A Shijima Story is a new unique mystery-adventure game.
Directed by Koichiro Ito (Metal Gear Solid V), and with Yasuhito Tachibana, producer of Netflix's 'The Naked Director' serving as the Cinematographer and Scenario Director, beautiful yet thrilling live-action footage intertwines with mysteries to solve, creating highly immersive gameplay.
The player follows a chain of murders which take place over the span of a century. Four murders have been committed in three different time periods - 1922, 1972, and 2022.
Each episode is comprised of three parts, the Incident phase, the Reasoning phase, and the Solution phase, inviting the player to seamlessly enter into this world of mystery.
Explore these time periods, collect multiple clues, and solve a 100-year mystery.

name: Pokipet
description: Create a group pet with your friends, family, or co-workers and give your pet the best life possible.

name: Wildlife Hunter: Survival
description:
Embark on an epic journey through diverse landscapes as you face the challenge of two exciting game modes: Level Mode and Survival Mode. In Level Mode, sharpen your hunting instincts and complete various tasks by taking down specific animal targets. Show off your marksmanship and strategic thinking as you progress through increasingly difficult levels.

If you're up for the ultimate test of survival, then Survival Mode is for you. Brace yourself as waves of wild animals approach, each more aggressive than the last. Your goal is to withstand the onslaught and survive against all odds. Can you keep your cool and outsmart these cunning creatures?

name: Run Legends
description:
Walk or run outside to fight “Sappers” - enemies that represent real-life anxieties. Build mental and physical health as you upgrade your gear, make new friends, and learn more about the characters' backstories.
Run Legends is the first-ever cooperative fitness game that you can play synchronously with your friends, no matter where they are in the world. Your movement controls your character: head outside and unleash skills in battle by moving faster and slower.

name: Swap: Mobile Edition
description: A simple yet brutally difficult game that will undoubtedly frustrate and personally insult you. Uncover a story full of psychological manipulation and emotional warfare while banging your head against unfairly designed levels. Sound like fun? Great! Let's see how that optimism is doing for you in a few hours.

name: Teachers. With Love and Passion
description: It's time to start a new life, make friends, live a sweet school romance, and face dark secrets.

name: Qi Yun Yi Meng
description: Qi Yun Yi Meng (translated as Clouds of Dreams) is a narrative-driven point-and-click adventure puzzle game.

name: Air Hockey-fuu: Soukai Taisen Action Game - Breaking Beats!
description: Hit the ball to the goal! This is a totally new, easy and fun air hockey game.

name: Chenmo de Xishuai
description: Chenmo de Xishuai is a cricket fighting game.

name: Gadget Racers
description: Gadget Racers is the first of two Choro-Q video games to be released on the Nintendo GameBoy Advance.

name: Dreams of Valhalla
description: Dreams of Valhalla is an action rogue where you battle through the 9 realms in order to obtain eternally glory in Valhalla.

name: Unreal World
description: A hanging up game for material collection and value enhancement

name: Abstract Driver
description: Abstract Driver is a 1-person game where you have to move inside a cylindrical space. This game is a dynamic action game in which you have to control the camera to the rhythmic music and score points. If you collect a certain number of points, you get achievements.

name: Survivor's End
description: Grab your guns and get ready to take on the zombie apocalypse like never before!

name: Rube Goldberg Workshop
description: In Rube Goldberg Workshop, you can make tons of different machines from over 80 components. Go from virtual reality to mixed reality and use objects and surfaces in the real world as part of your creations. Bounce basketballs off your ceiling and into a set of drums! Use your kitchen table to set up an epic car stunt jump, equipped with fireworks and all! If you can imagine it, you can build it. Push the boundaries of your imagination in a game made for mixed reality.

name: In Your Youth
description: A two-player game filled with puzzles, mystery and romance! Discover clues, crack codes and find your true love?!

name: Tooth Fairy Horse
description: Welcome to Tooth Fairy Horse - Ride into this lovely horse game and start to take care of your very own adorable foal! Become the best horse keeper in the magical unicorn and pony farm! Care for and breed your own little pony and watch as they grow into beautiful purebreds on the fairy islands!

name: Four Chambers of the Human Heart
description:
A professional cosplayer leads an ordinary life.

He takes on a job in pest control, where his boss insists he works in full cosplay to differentiate the business from the competition.

The story follows the indignation and humiliation of the protagonist, as he aims to become independently wealthy.

name: Geminiii
description:
Don't expect gravity to be complicit to your wishes

How will you apply pressure to the variables? How many turns will it take you to solve Geminiii?

name: AlterSpace
description:
A space exploration game.

Explore the huge universe while you also try to find out why all humans got extinct, and by what.

name: Revvolvver
description: Revvolvver is a crazy multiplayer (up to four) platformer that places emphasis on accuracy. Hitting targets with all six of your revvolvvers bullets will win the game. Will you choose accuracy or brute force?

name: Heroes of Spyria
description: A JRPG style fantasy game reminiscent of SNES classics.

name: Skoory Rush
description: The most absurdly amusing arcade game to hit your screens! Can you keep up with the chaos and out-score your friends? Find out as you climb the online leaderboards and become the ultimate Skoory Rush Master!

name: Puffer Pop
description: Puffer Pop is a short puzzle game about saving a pufferfish from the sharks that chase her. Eat bubbles, inflate, and turn the tides on those that would eat you, all while relaxing to calming sound of ocean waves.

name: Just Skill Shooter
description: Just Skill Shooter is a first-person shooter game where you take on the role of a soldier fighting enemies in two different maps. You have access to different weapons - a rifle, a shotgun or other- which you can use to eliminate enemy combatants.

name: Testament: The Order of High-Human
description: Testament is a first-person single-player action-adventure game with bits of RPG and metroidvania elements set in a post-apocalyptic fantasy world. It offers a mixed combat with different possibilities and combination by sword, spells and bow while it is rich with platforming and puzzles.

name: Pokemon Bois
description: Humorous old-school Pokemon fangame.

name: Micro Machines
description: Game Gear port of Micro Machines.

name: Micro Machines
description: Sega Genesis port of Micro Machines

name: Micro Machines
description: SNES port of Micro Machines.

name: Micro Machines
description: Master System port of Micro Machines.

name: Micro Machines
description: Home computer port of Micro Machines.

name: Micro Machines
description: Phillips CD-i port of Micro Machines.

name: Micro Machines
description: Game Boy port of Micro Machines.

name: MicroMachines
description: Game Boy Advance port of the remake of Micro Machines.

name: Edo Mono
description: Edo Mono is a historical simulation game for Playstation 2, released on 2005

name: Type King
description: Type King has three different game modes: Typing, Jumping and those combined makes Type King! With some variety and different difficulties there is a total of fifteen levels to beat before you can be crowned the Type King!

name: Elizord's Tale
description: This is a first-person horror game with jumpscares that tells the tale of the character Elizord who gained a power to take revenge on everyone who mocked him in his kingdom.

name: Synth Beasts
description: Capture and harness powerful beasts to do combat and traverse the world in this monster taming action-adventure. Unravel the mystery of your existence by exploring a sinister island laboratory and putting an end to the creation of the Synth Beasts.

name: Doctor Who: Ood Escape
description: Guide your team to safety and escape the Ood in this Doctor Who online game! It's the worst case scenario, your crew are trapped in a Sanctuary Base on a hostile planet.

name: Lost in Darklight
description: Lost in Darklight is a live action interactive FMV game. A retired ace soldier, four girls, a hidden chamber at home, genetic cloning tech... Experience interactive panoramic evidence searching with this game and decide your own ending. Every choice you make is crucial!

name: Nano Force
description:
Get ready for some paint-splattering, adrenaline-pumping action in this color-filled multiplayer first-person shooter!

Blast goo and cover the playing field in your team's color before time runs out, all without getting soaked by enemy fire. Whether you're a casual or competitive player, come join the messy, colorful fun and shoot your way to victory.

name: Uchikano: Living With My Lovers
description: Uchikano: Living With My Lovers is a fully-featured erotic visual novel focused around the excitement of living with multiple lovers, with lots of CGs, and everything else you'd expect from having a feminine couple at home!

name: Doctor Who: Sonic De-Cloaker
description: The Tenth Doctor has many enemies scattered through Time and Space. Seek out the monsters, but avoid the black holes! The trick to defeating them is being one step ahead of their evil plans - but to do that you have to find them first. Point the sonic screwdriver at the sector of space, then click to scan it. Find monsters, and data points are uploaded into the TARDIS computer.

name: Treasure Tombs: Ra Deal
description: Tip-toe your way through cursed Egyptian tombs, picking up priceless loot and ancient artifacts, and meet some very interesting characters along the way in Dark Tonic is puzzle-strategy “rogue-lite” adventure.

name: Paranormal Pop
description:
Pop, Blast and Banish Ghosts!
The intrepid ghost hunter McGrimsby needs your help! A sinister entity has come to haunt the shady town of Spookshire! Pop your way to the heart of the matter and figure out who’s unleashed all of these ghosts!
Paranormal Pop is a Match-3 ghost busting game with more than one twist, including unique gameplay, missions and special hidden bonus levels! Meet wicked companions, and deliciously evil bosses in this first chapter in the Spooktacular world or Paranormal Pop!

name: Liberation
description: Liberation is a strategy survival horror game. You have to go to the Deathworld and collect crosses to liberate ghosts. Survive from the attacks of various ghosts!

name: Lord of Terror
description: In a galaxy far away a world is facing doomsday. As nations rise against each other the world is plunged into chaos. Many illegal groups such as gangs and independent militias and demonic cults take the advantage of the situation to expand. Your task is to assassinate a demon dubbed Lord of Terror.

name: Immersive Jurassic World Roller Coaster VR
description: This is a unique 3D casual game. Bringing players into the original lush forest and exotic planet through immersive VR technology, and experience the world of dinosaurs.

name: Micegard
description: MiceGard is an adventure game where you will play as mouse-vikings. Immerse yourself in a unique world inspired by Scandinavian mythology.

name: The Paradixion: Son's Room
description: The Paraxition: Son's Room is the first series of The Paraxition, a point-and-click adventure game with a mysterious atmosphere developed by a solo developer in Korea.

name: The Unfair Platformer
description: Who said platform games had to be nice and fair? Time for a little change. Arrow keys to move, try get through all the levels. You don't have lives, but it records how many you lose. You will lose a lot, the game is pretty hard, so try not to get too mad on the first level. And yes, the game is possible.

name: Happy Saint Sheol
description: Two thousand years ago, the Pestis Disaster swept through the land, corrupting all living things and making it too difficult to live on the land. Having touched the darkest darkness the world has seen, one must now face the dazzling light. Thus I pose this question. Whose wings did I see that day?

name: Don't Go, Pikachu!
description:
No time to rest! Pikachu has been kidnapped and needs your help!

Battle your way through five randomly generated environments in this unique roguelike adventure!
Beating the game rewards a badge and unlocks new starters — can you collect all?

Short roguelike Pokémon fangame that runs with a fast combat system featuring permadeath and limited PP.

name: Attack Force
description: Arcade Military shooter developed by Electronic Games Systems in 1979.

name: Attack UFO
description: Space Invaders clone released by Ryuto Electric Co. in 1980.

name: ATV Track
description: A four-wheel motorcycle racing simulator with four different circuits and two selectable modes: Practice and Competition.

name: Criptotamagothic Lite
description: They are here!! The Criptotamagothic!! Pet your fiend! One free tamagothic monster will be included in the game Tamarindos freaking dinner! collect them all!! Meet your first tamagothic in this Lite version!

name: 114 Miles to Doctor Noodles Farm
description: A waiting-simulator story epilogue of Tamarindo's Freaking Dinner, the upcoming brand new game sequel of Baobabs Mausoleum. Published by Neon Doctrine.

name: Marley & Marley
description: Your Future is a Horror Story Written by your Crimes! A 2021 X-mas horror short game gift from Jacob Jazz! A horrifying adaptation of Charles Dickens "Muppets A Christmas Carol" Bah! Hambug!

name: Jacob Jazz's The Bus
description: A short horror story epilogue of Tamarindo's Freaking Dinner, the upcoming sequel to Baobabs Mausoleum.

name: Weird West: Definitive Edition
description: Discover a dark fantasy reimagining of the Wild West where lawmen and gunslingers share the frontier with fantastical creatures. Journey through the story of a group of atypical heroes, written into legend by the decisions you make in an unforgiving land. Each journey is unique and tailored to the actions taken - a series of high stakes adventures where everything counts and the world reacts to the choices you make. Form a posse or venture forth alone into an otherworldly confines of the Weird West and make each legend your own.

name: SMW
description: An open-source reimplementation of Super Mario World. It requires the original game to extract its assets.

name: Blow Away Survivors
description: "Blow Away Survivors" is a thrilling casual roguelite action game where you unleash attacks, sending countless enemies flying. Face massive enemy hordes and powerful bosses, level up and grow stronger. Enjoy diverse skills and actions powered by a physics engine, all in short, exciting sessions.

name: Doctor Who: The Doctor and the Dalek
description: It's time to save the universe! Help the Doctor and his unlikely companion in a quest that spans the galaxy. Find the Orb of Fates before the Sontarans, Cybermen and Daleks can in this thrilling adventure.

name: Ark: Survival Ascended
description: Ark: Survival Ascended is a next-generation remaster of our beloved ARK: Survival Evolved, harnessing the power of Unreal Engine 5. The base game will include SOTF and all the Ark: Survival Evolved DLC maps (which will be added to ASA over time).

name: Ortheo
description: Ortheo is a bite-sized open-world momentum-based 3D platformer. Join Ortheo and explore massive worlds in this all-new 3D globe-trotting adventure! Explore huge beautiful worlds and collect tons of coins and gears.

name: Patchouli: A Little War in Bland-Old Library
description: Patchouli is a Touhou fangame based on the gameplay of the Suguri series, featuring horizontal scrolling shooting gameplay.

name: Akasha
description: Akasha is a 2nd person fighting game and shooter hybrid with a PvPvE extraction game mode. It blends the two genres by allowing the player to control 2 characters in real time.

name: Nuke Them All
description: An RTS classic reborn with a twist. Time is of the essence, Commander! Capture the flags, conquer the territories, and eliminate the enemy fort. And finally, nuke them all! This old-school sci-fi Indie real time strategy game, crafted by a devoted fan, revives the genre's enduring allure.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Fall of Hyrule
description: ActionGamer is here to present to you the official sequel in the Triforce Power Saga, The Legend of Zelda: Fall of Hyrule. It has every feature and improvement you loved about Triforce Power and more.

name: War Legends
description: War Legends is a classic real-time strategy. There are no auto battles or asynchronous multiplayer. The game happens in real time and you control every single unit on the battlefield. You have to mine resources, build structures, and hire an army, just as it used to be in the old school RTS on PC.

name: Nasty Neighbors: No Country for Curmudgeon
description: A logic-arcade game in which we plague a certain rich neighbor in various ways. The game consists in sabotaging the devices located in the neighbor's villa, as well as causing accidents involving the neighbor. All this is shown in a humorous form and with a big pinch of salt.

name: Wolfhound: The Way of the Warrior
description: Is a Russian computer game in the Action/RPG genre, developed by Gaijin Entertainment for the Microsoft Windows platform. The game is based on novels by Russian writer Maria Semyonova and the movie "Wolfhound", which was released in 2006.

name: Wolfhound: The Last of the Grey Dogs
description: A Russian Top-down Action-RPG game based on novels of Russian writer Maria Semyonova and 2006's film "Wolfhound".

name: Jiggly Zone
description: Welcome to the Jiggly Zone. Become Jiggler and find the seven Medallions scattered throughout the land, by collecting forty-two Shards.

name: Zeta
description: Sin descripción

name: Matemágica
description: Matemágica is an educational game for children that aims to teach early math skills and logic. The game was only released in Spanish and its divided on 10 CDs.

name: Hana: Hide and Seek
description: You move into the city, away from your family. Luckily you find a cheap goshiwon. Although, the day you move in weird things started to happen. You keep seeing this woman... A woman with long black hair covering her face, scrawny body, with long deformed limbs. And the more you fear it, the stronger it gets. And it won't stop until you're dead... will you survive?

name: Bird Brawl
description:
The avian love-child of Angry Birds and Smash Brothers, Bird Brawl follows the flight pattern of other fast-paced multiplayer fighting games.

Using lasers, waterballoons, eggs and more, up to four players can ruffle each others feathers in a battle-royale to see who can first reach enough points to advance to the next level in this shooting game.

Explore the cartoony world of Bok's Barnyard, soaring through skies, trees, and underground passageways using WASD controls and your mouse to aim and shoot.

This flash-based arcade game is playable right out of your browser, lets you battle your buddies by sharing a link, or brawl with other anonymous players online without any registration or download. Select your favorite bird--a free-flying hummingbird, or a chicken "tank"--and try to get first place in the pecking order!

name: Total War: Pharaoh
description: Total War: Pharaoh features a choice of eight faction leaders from three rich cultural hubs, with unique playstyles and diverse unit rosters. Whether you’re charming the courts as a peerless diplomat, charging into battle as an unwavering commander or causing chaos as a fearless warlord, become a leader that history will remember.

name: Pokémon Crater
description: Pokémon Crater was an unofficial online Pokémon game that was played with just a mouse. The site was created by webmaster Aaron in 1999 and received numerous updates throughout the years, reaching version 7 before closing on December 1, 2007. The site was recreated as Pokémon Vortex in 2009.

name: Virtua Photo Studio
description: Sin descripción

name: Löwenzahn: Geschichten aus Natur, Umwelt und Technik
description: An educational game based on the German TV show 'Löwenzahn'. The game teaches kids about nature, economy and technical aspects on the world.

name: Tamatown
description: Tamatown was an interactive website for the Tamagotchi Connection Version 3, and later for the Version 4 and Version 4.5. It was an extension to the virtual pets, and allowed players to connect to the site and earn prizes for their Tamagotchi device.

name: Hirogaru Sky! Precure: Hirogaru! Puzzle Collection
description: Based on the TV anime "Soaring Sky! Pretty Cure". It is a minigame collection of puzzle and table games that anyone can enjoy, such as finding mistakes and jigsaw puzzles.

name: The Diner
description: This project started as a small prototype, for testing Godot 4's new graphics capabilities, but as time went on, it slowly became a full-on, short, interactive horror experience.

name: True Maze Defiance
description: "True Maze Defiance" is a thrilling game where you navigate a ball through a challenging maze, collecting diamonds and avoiding obstacles. Its unique control system, which uses mouse tilting, adds to the excitement and immersion. With engaging gameplay and increasing difficulty.

name: The Pit
description: Fight extremely challenging bosses by dodging their every attack and landing powerful combos. In a game that tests your reaction speed while making you feel untouchable.

name: Gravity
description: Manipulate gravity and deduce the clear conditions! A compact but full-fledged puzzle game with a high level of difficulty!

name: Balls and Coins
description: Are you looking for a definite solution to boredom? Then you are in the right place. Physics-based running game Balls and Coins promise excitement, tranquility, and peace of mind, while also pushing your limits. Avoid enemies and obstacles, collect coins, and be the who achieves the highest score.

name: Anno 1800: Fiesta Pack
description: Celebrate the cultural boom of the New World and beautify your residents' neighborhoods with a combination of over 20 new ornaments and skin variations!
